original: thugs mi bskyod pa'i rigs so //
analyzed: thugs mi bskyod pa'i rigs so //
translated: is of the family of Akshobhya.

original: gang gi dpral bar rtse gsum pa //
analyzed: gang gi dpral bar rtse gsum pa //
translated: She who has a trident on her forehead

original: zhes bya ba ni dpral bar rtse gsum pa'i dbyibs dang / kha dog dmar ser la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni sgrol ma ste he ru ka'i l'a ma'i rigs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dpral bar rtse gsum pa'i dbyibs dang / kha dog dmar ser la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni sgrol ma ste he ru ka'i l'a ma'i rigs so //
translated: is Tara, who has the characteristics of the shape and the red-yellow color of a trident on her forehead, and is of the family of Heruka's Lama.

original: 'khor lo gang gi dpral ba'am //
analyzed: 'khor lo gang gi dpral ba'am //
translated: She who has a wheel on her forehead

original: zhes bya ba ni dbyibs dang kha dog sngon po dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbyibs dang kha dog sngon po dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs so //
translated: has the characteristics of the shape and the blue color of a wheel on her forehead, and is of the family of Vairochana.

original: gang zhig mig sman nag 'dra zhing //
analyzed: gang zhig mig sman nag 'dra zhing //
translated: She who is like black ointment🔽and white and tall

original: kha dog dkar zhing mtho ba dang // zhes bya ba ni dbyibs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i yum rdo rje phag mo'i rigs so //
analyzed: kha dog dkar zhing mtho ba dang // zhes bya ba ni dbyibs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i yum rdo rje phag mo'i rigs so //
translated: has the characteristics of the shape and so forth of Vajravarahi, and is of the family of the mother Vajravarahi.

original: ser zhing ser ba'i mdog 'drar snang //
analyzed: ser zhing ser ba'i mdog 'drar snang //
translated: She who is yellow and appears yellow

original: zhes bya ba'i kha dog dang / mig mi g-yo ba la sogs pa'i dbyibs dang ldan pa'i khanda ro ha'i rigs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i kha dog dang / mig mi g-yo ba la sogs pa'i dbyibs dang ldan pa'i khanda ro ha'i rigs so //
translated: has the color and the shape of unmoving eyes and so forth, and is of the family of Khagarbha.

original: gang zhig rtag par sha la dga' //
analyzed: gang zhig rtag par sha la dga' //
translated: She who always delights in meat

original: zhes bya ba spyod lam dang / mig sman gyi mdog la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni nam mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba spyod lam dang / mig sman gyi mdog la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni nam mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs so //
translated: is endowed with the characteristics of the conduct and the color of collyrium, and so forth.

original: sprin gyi mdog 'dra'i bud med gang //
analyzed: sprin gyi mdog 'dra'i bud med gang //
translated: She who is the color of a cloud🔽is endowed with the color,

original: zhes bya ba'i kha dog dang / so ni mi mnyam par gnas @397b shing ;🔽/ zhes bya ba'i dbyibs dang / rtag gdug pa yi las la dga' //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i kha dog dang / so ni mi mnyam par gnas @397b shing ; / zhes bya ba'i dbyibs dang / rtag gdug pa yi las la dga' //
translated: and her teeth are uneven,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i spyod lam dang ldan pa ni gzugs can ma'i rigs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i spyod lam dang ldan pa ni gzugs can ma'i rigs so //
translated: and she is endowed with the conduct of always delighting in cruel actions, and so forth.

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs 'di dag / ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs 'di dag / ces bya ba ni /
translated: This assembly of dakinis

original: rigs gsum yab yum lnga'i tshogs so //
analyzed: rigs gsum yab yum lnga'i tshogs so //
translated: is the assembly of the five fathers and mothers of the three families.

original: zhes bya ba ci'i phyir gsungs she na //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ci'i phyir gsungs she na //
translated: Why is this said?

original: sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to benefit the practitioner.

original: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la phan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la phan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is said in order to benefit the wheel of the assembly.

original: le'u bco brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u bco brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the eighteenth chapter.

original: // / tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i lha mo bshad nas //
analyzed: // / tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i lha mo bshad nas //
translated: Having explained the goddesses of the gaṇacakra,

original: mchod pa'i lha mo bshad pa ni //
analyzed: mchod pa'i lha mo bshad pa ni //
translated: the explanation of the goddesses of offering is as follows.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Then, moreover, what is to be explained

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te //
translated: is stated.

original: dpa' bo'i lha mo la gzhan yang bkas gnang bas mchod pa byed pa'i lha mo bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i lha mo la gzhan yang bkas gnang bas mchod pa byed pa'i lha mo bshad par bya'o //
translated: Since the hero's goddesses are also authorized, the goddesses of offering should be explained.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa la mchod pa'i yan lag tu bkas gnang ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa la mchod pa'i yan lag tu bkas gnang ba yin no //
translated: They are authorized as branches of offering for yogins of the family of Vairocana and so forth.

original: sgrub pa po yis l'a ma yin //
analyzed: sgrub pa po yis l'a ma yin //
translated: The one who is Lāmā is for the adept.

original: zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i phrin las byed pa'i sgrol ma'i rigs kyi lha mo ni l'a ma'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i phrin las byed pa'i sgrol ma'i rigs kyi lha mo ni l'a ma'o //
translated: The goddess of the Tārā family who performs the activity of offering is Lāmā.

original: de yang rigs kyi bye brag gis lnga yod pas mtshan nyid kyi khyad par dang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de yang rigs kyi bye brag gis lnga yod pas mtshan nyid kyi khyad par dang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Moreover, since there are five of them due to the distinctions of family, the distinctive characteristics are mentioned.

original: de yang kha dog gi mtshan nyid kyi khyad par dang / dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid kyi khyad par dang / spyod lam gyi khyad par dang / zla mtshan 'byung ba'i khyad par dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya'i yan lag gi khyad par gyi yan lag gi tshig shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang kha dog gi mtshan nyid kyi khyad par dang / dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid kyi khyad par dang / spyod lam gyi khyad par dang / zla mtshan 'byung ba'i khyad par dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya'i yan lag gi khyad par gyi yan lag gi tshig shes par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, one should know the words of the branches, the branch of the characteristics of color, the branch of the characteristics of shape, the branch of conduct, and the branch of the characteristics of the menstrual period, together with the consort, and the branch of the characteristics of the limbs.

original: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
translated: Having thus taught in brief, the extensive explanation is as follows.

original: bud med gang zhig bzhin zlum zhing sma ra dang smin ma ring ba dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: bud med gang zhig bzhin zlum zhing sma ra dang smin ma ring ba dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The characteristics of shape are that a woman has a round face, long eyebrows and eyelashes.

original: gos gtsang ba dang / sems zhi ba dang / bden par smra ba dang / dam pa'i chos la dga' ba ni spyod lam gyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: gos gtsang ba dang / sems zhi ba dang / bden par smra ba dang / dam pa'i chos la dga' ba ni spyod lam gyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The characteristics of conduct are that she wears clean clothes, has a peaceful mind, speaks truthfully, and delights in the true Dharma.

original: de'i yan lag gi phyag rgya ni rnal 'byor bas mthe chung dang / mthe bo gnyis so sor gshibs la sor mo rnams brkyang ba ni padma'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de'i yan lag gi phyag rgya ni rnal 'byor bas mthe chung dang / mthe bo gnyis so sor gshibs la sor mo rnams brkyang ba ni padma'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: Her branch consort is that the yogin extends the little finger and thumb separately, and the other fingers are extended, which is the lotus consort.

original: lag pa g-yon pas kha spub tu byas pa la g-yas pas de'i steng du kha sbubs nas g-yon pa'i sor mo'i bar du g-yas pa'i sor mo gzhag pa ni rus sbal @398a * //🔽gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pas kha spub tu byas pa la g-yas pas de'i steng du kha sbubs nas g-yon pa'i sor mo'i bar du g-yas pa'i sor mo gzhag pa ni rus sbal @398a * // gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The turtle gesture is made by placing the right hand palm down on the left hand palm down, with the fingers of the right hand between the fingers of the left hand.

original: de'i len du rnal 'byor mas padma'i lan ri dags kyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: de'i len du rnal 'byor mas padma'i lan ri dags kyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The doe gesture is the response to that, held by the yoginī. It is the gesture of Avalokiteśvara.

original: g-yon pa'i khu tshur nu ma g-yon pa'i steng du bzhag pa ni rus sbal gyi lan du rdo rje khu tshur pus mo'i steng du bzhag pa ni byams pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i khu tshur nu ma g-yon pa'i steng du bzhag pa ni rus sbal gyi lan du rdo rje khu tshur pus mo'i steng du bzhag pa ni byams pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The vajra fist gesture is the response to the turtle gesture. It is the gesture of Maitreya.

original: tshes bcu la zla mtshan 'byung ba dang / spyod lam ni khyim du padma bri ba'o //
analyzed: tshes bcu la zla mtshan 'byung ba dang / spyod lam ni khyim du padma bri ba'o //
translated: The ten days of menstruation are the time, and the conduct is drawing a lotus in the house.

original: de ltar rdo rje rigs kyi l'a ma bshad nas padma rigs kyi l'a ma bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje rigs kyi l'a ma bshad nas padma rigs kyi l'a ma bshad pa ni /
translated: Having explained the vajra family’s lāmās, the lāmās of the lotus family are now explained.

original: mchu ring zhing mig dkyus ring ba ni dbyibs so //
analyzed: mchu ring zhing mig dkyus ring ba ni dbyibs so //
translated: Long lips and long eyes is the shape.

original: dmar ser ni kha dog go //
analyzed: dmar ser ni kha dog go //
translated: Orange is the color.

original: phyug pa la sogs pa ni yon tan no //
analyzed: phyug pa la sogs pa ni yon tan no //
translated: Wealth and so forth are the qualities.

original: ring min thung min ni dbyibs so //
analyzed: ring min thung min ni dbyibs so //
translated: Not long and not short is the shape.

original: sna tshogs pa'i gos la dga' ba ni spyod lam mo //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i gos la dga' ba ni spyod lam mo //
translated: The enjoyment of various garments is the behavior.

original: dpral bar ri mo gsum yod pa dang / skra mtshams gyen du bltas pa ni dbyibs so //
analyzed: dpral bar ri mo gsum yod pa dang / skra mtshams gyen du bltas pa ni dbyibs so //
translated: The three lines on the forehead and the hair standing up are the shape.

original: dgod cing dga' ba la sogs pa ni spyod lam mo //
analyzed: dgod cing dga' ba la sogs pa ni spyod lam mo //
translated: Laughing, enjoying, and so forth is the behavior.

original: de la rnal 'byor pas mdzub mo g-yon pa bsgreng ba mdung gi phyag rgya bstan pa dang rkang pa g-yon pa bskum pa'i gar bstan nas rnal 'byor mas lan du lag pa g-yon pa'i mdung ni phyag rgya byed pa dang / g-yon pa bskor nas 'gro ba ni phyag rgya'i lan no //
analyzed: de la rnal 'byor pas mdzub mo g-yon pa bsgreng ba mdung gi phyag rgya bstan pa dang rkang pa g-yon pa bskum pa'i gar bstan nas rnal 'byor mas lan du lag pa g-yon pa'i mdung ni phyag rgya byed pa dang / g-yon pa bskor nas 'gro ba ni phyag rgya'i lan no //
translated: There, the yogin displays the spear mudra of the raised left finger and the dance of the bent left leg. In response, the yoginī makes the spear mudra of the left hand and the mudrā response of going around to the left.

original: bcu bzhi dang tshes brgyad ni zla mtshan gyi dus so //
analyzed: bcu bzhi dang tshes brgyad ni zla mtshan gyi dus so //
translated: The fourteenth and eighth days are the menstrual period.

original: khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa bri ba ni spyod lam mo //
analyzed: khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa bri ba ni spyod lam mo //
translated: Drawing a trident in the house is the behavior.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi l'a ma ston pa nas /
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi l'a ma ston pa nas /
translated: The teaching of the Lāmā of Lokeśvara is as follows:

original: las kyi rigs kyi l'a ma ston pa'i bar mkhur tshos su khung bu snang ba ni dbyibs so //
analyzed: las kyi rigs kyi l'a ma ston pa'i bar mkhur tshos su khung bu snang ba ni dbyibs so //
translated: The appearance of a cavity in the cheek is the shape.

original: dmar ser ni kha dog go //
analyzed: dmar ser ni kha dog go //
translated: Orange is the color.

original: skra 'khyil ba ni dbyibs so //
analyzed: skra 'khyil ba ni dbyibs so //
translated: Curly hair is the shape.

original: dpral ba dar gyis bcings pa ni spyod lam mo //
analyzed: dpral ba dar gyis bcings pa ni spyod lam mo //
translated: The forehead bound with cloth is the deportment.

original: dpral bar ri mo gcig yod cing mgrin pa ring ba ni dbyibs so //
analyzed: dpral bar ri mo gcig yod cing mgrin pa ring ba ni dbyibs so //
translated: The forehead having one line and the neck long is the shape.

original: gos dmar po la dga' ba ni spyod lam mo //
analyzed: gos dmar po la dga' ba ni spyod lam mo //
translated: The delight in red garments is the deportment.

original: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mo bsgrengs nas mdung gi phyag rgya bya ba dang / g-yon pa'i pus mo'i thad kar kha thur du bya ba ni dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mo bsgrengs nas mdung gi phyag rgya bya ba dang / g-yon pa'i pus mo'i thad kar kha thur du bya ba ni dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan pa'o //
translated: The mudra of the spear is made by extending the forefinger of the right fist, and the mudra of the bell is made by turning the left knee downward.

original: rnal 'byor pas g-yon nas ldog pa lan yin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas g-yon nas ldog pa lan yin no //
translated: The yogin should do it in reverse order.

original: las kyi l'a ma bstan nas he ru ka'i l'a ma bstan pa ni thung zhing byin pa sbom pa ni dbyibs so //
analyzed: las kyi l'a ma bstan nas he ru ka'i l'a ma bstan pa ni thung zhing byin pa sbom pa ni dbyibs so //
translated: Having taught the mudra of Karma, the mudra of Heruka is taught: Short and having thick thighs is the shape.

original: gos ser la dga' ba ni spyod lam mo //
analyzed: gos ser la dga' ba ni spyod lam mo //
translated: The delight in yellow garments is the deportment.

original: bud med de g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyi @398b gung mo bsgreng ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: bud med de g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyi @398b gung mo bsgreng ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The woman’s right fist with the index finger extended is the vajra gesture.

original: gnyis pa dung gi phyag rgya ni sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mo bcu ma pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa dung gi phyag rgya ni sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mo bcu ma pa'o //
translated: The second, the conch gesture, is with all the fingers in a circle.

original: rnal 'byor mas g-yon nas yongs su ldog pa ni phyag rgya'i lan no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mas g-yon nas yongs su ldog pa ni phyag rgya'i lan no //
translated: The yoginī’s left-facing gesture is the response gesture.

original: bcu bzhi ni zla mtshan 'byung ba'i dus su //
analyzed: bcu bzhi ni zla mtshan 'byung ba'i dus su //
translated: The fourteenth is the time of menstruation.

original: khyim du rdo rje 'dri ba ni spyod lam mo //
analyzed: khyim du rdo rje 'dri ba ni spyod lam mo //
translated: The vajra drawing in the house is the conduct.

original: he ru ka'i l'a ma bstan nas /
analyzed: he ru ka'i l'a ma bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the Heruka lāmās,

original: phag mo'i l'a ma ni lus kun la spu yod pa ni dbyibs so //
analyzed: phag mo'i l'a ma ni lus kun la spu yod pa ni dbyibs so //
translated: the vārāhī lāmās are as follows: The presence of hair on the entire body is the shape.

original: mig nag cing ser ba ni kha dog go //
analyzed: mig nag cing ser ba ni kha dog go //
translated: Black and yellow eyes is the color.

original: sbom pa la sogs pa ni dbyibs so //
analyzed: sbom pa la sogs pa ni dbyibs so //
translated: Being fat and so on is the shape.

original: glu mkhas pa ni spyod lam mo //
analyzed: glu mkhas pa ni spyod lam mo //
translated: Being skilled in singing is the conduct.

original: sprin gyi mdog can ni kha dog go //
analyzed: sprin gyi mdog can ni kha dog go //
translated: Having a cloud-like color is the color.

original: de la rnal 'byor pas lag pa'i sor mo bcu brkyang nas glu'i phyag rgya bstan pa ni khu tshur g-yon nas mdzub mo bsgreng ba mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de la rnal 'byor pas lag pa'i sor mo bcu brkyang nas glu'i phyag rgya bstan pa ni khu tshur g-yon nas mdzub mo bsgreng ba mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya'o //
translated: The yogi displays the mudra of song by extending the ten fingers of his hands, and displays the mudra of the spear by extending the forefinger from the left fist.

original: rnal 'byor mas g-yon nas ldog pa ni phyag rgya'i lan no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mas g-yon nas ldog pa ni phyag rgya'i lan no //
translated: The yogi's reply is to reverse the mudra from the left.

original: tshes bcu gcig ni zla mtshan 'byung ba'i dus so //
analyzed: tshes bcu gcig ni zla mtshan 'byung ba'i dus so //
translated: The eleventh day is the time of menstruation.

original: khyim du rdo rje 'dri ba ni spyod lam mo //
analyzed: khyim du rdo rje 'dri ba ni spyod lam mo //
translated: The conduct is to draw a vajra in the house.

original: le'u bcu dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u bcu dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the nineteenth chapter.

original: // / de ltar lha mo gsum gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar lha mo gsum gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the characteristics of the three goddesses,

original: lha mo gsum gyi brda bstan pa ni /
analyzed: lha mo gsum gyi brda bstan pa ni /
translated: the teaching of the symbols of the three goddesses is as follows.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Next, I will explain🔽the symbols of the three goddesses.

original: de la dang po dbang gi lha mo'i brda bstan te /
analyzed: de la dang po dbang gi lha mo'i brda bstan te /
translated: Therein, first the symbol of the goddess of empowerment is taught:

original: mkha' 'gro g-yon gyi grva rnams te //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro g-yon gyi grva rnams te //
translated: The dakinis are in the left corners,

original: zhes bya ba ni ye shes dang gnas dang sngags las skyes pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ye shes dang gnas dang sngags las skyes pas so //
translated: born from wisdom, place, and mantra.

original: g-yon gyi brda ni zhi gnas kyi bde ba dang / lhag mthong stong pa nyid sgom pa ni brda'o //
analyzed: g-yon gyi brda ni zhi gnas kyi bde ba dang / lhag mthong stong pa nyid sgom pa ni brda'o //
translated: The sign on the left is the bliss of śamatha, and the sign on the right is the meditation on the emptiness of vipaśyanā.

original: dgos pa ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: dgos pa ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the purpose?

original: spun dang sring mor shes pa'o //
analyzed: spun dang sring mor shes pa'o //
translated: One should know the brother and sister.

original: kha sbyor dang mnyam sbyor las brda 'di rnams ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brda yin pas tha mal pa'i spyod lam bzhag nas zag pa med pa'i spyod lam la 'jug pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: kha sbyor dang mnyam sbyor las brda 'di rnams ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brda yin pas tha mal pa'i spyod lam bzhag nas zag pa med pa'i spyod lam la 'jug pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
translated: In the Union and Equal Union, these signs are the signs of the buddhas and bodhisattvas. Therefore, one should set aside ordinary conduct and engage in the conduct of the undefiled.

original: rgyud 'dir sbyor ba'i dus su spun dang sring mor shes par bya ba dang / dngos gzhi'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda byed pa dang gnyis ka yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyud 'dir sbyor ba'i dus su spun dang sring mor shes par bya ba dang / dngos gzhi'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda byed pa dang gnyis ka yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: In this tantra, at the time of the preliminaries, one should know the brother and sister, and at the time of the main practice, one should know both the one who makes the sign of the tathāgatas and the one who knows the sign.

original: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni lag pa g-yon pa ston pas phyag 'tshal ba dang srin lag ston pas phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i lan du ston pa ni sbyor ba'i tshe na'o //
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni lag pa g-yon pa ston pas phyag 'tshal ba dang srin lag ston pas phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i lan du ston pa ni sbyor ba'i tshe na'o //
translated: Having explained that in brief, the extensive explanation is as follows: Showing the left hand is the greeting, showing the ring finger is the response to the greeting, and so on. This is at the time of the preliminaries.

original: ngo shes par byed pa @399a * //
analyzed: ngo shes par byed pa @399a * //
translated: The recognition🔽is the recognition of the mudra at the time of the preliminary practice, or the recognition of the mudra at the time of the main practice.

original: dang / dngos gzhi zag bcas kyi spyod pa btul nas zag med kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: dang / dngos gzhi zag bcas kyi spyod pa btul nas zag med kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa yin no //
translated: The main practice is the practice of the contaminated conduct, and then the practice of the uncontaminated conduct.

original: lhag ma ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
translated: The rest is easy to understand and so is not explained.

original: le'u nyi shu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the twentieth chapter.

original: // / de ltar dbang gi lha mo'i brda bstan nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar dbang gi lha mo'i brda bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the symbolic gestures of the goddess of empowerment,

original: tshogs kyi 'khor lo dpa' bo'i lha mo'i brda bshad pa ni /
analyzed: tshogs kyi 'khor lo dpa' bo'i lha mo'i brda bshad pa ni /
translated: the explanation of the symbolic gestures of the goddess of the hero’s gaṇacakra is as follows.

original: de nas yang dag phyag rgya yi //🔽mtshan nyid dang yis bshad par bya //
analyzed: de nas yang dag phyag rgya yi // mtshan nyid dang yis bshad par bya //
translated: Next, the characteristics of the true mudrā

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: will be explained by me.

original: lag pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni sbyor ba'i tshe na ngo shes par byed pa'am dngos gzhi'i tshes sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam ston pa'o //
analyzed: lag pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni sbyor ba'i tshe na ngo shes par byed pa'am dngos gzhi'i tshes sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam ston pa'o //
translated: The characteristics of the hand mudrā are the recognition of the mudrā at the time of the preliminary practice or the display of the conduct of the buddhas at the time of the main practice.

original: dngos gzhi de ltar byas kyang ci zhig thob par 'gyur zhe na /🔽gsang ba'am ni don chen la //
analyzed: dngos gzhi de ltar byas kyang ci zhig thob par 'gyur zhe na / gsang ba'am ni don chen la //
translated: If it is asked what is attained by doing the main practice in that way,

original: phyag rgya 'di ni sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di ni sbyar bar bya //
translated: this mudrā should be applied to the secret or the great meaning.

original: zhes gsungs pas /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas /
translated: Since it is said,

original: dngos grub lha las len pa'am /
analyzed: dngos grub lha las len pa'am /
translated: the siddhi is taken from the deity.

original: rnal 'byor ma las len pa gnyis su shes par byas te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma las len pa gnyis su shes par byas te /
translated: One should understand that there are two ways of receiving the powers:🔽from the deity, and from the yoginis.

original: dngos grub lha las len pa ni lha'i snying gar bcug pas rnal 'byor mngon sum bskyed pa'i byin rlabs kyis lam ston pa yin la /
analyzed: dngos grub lha las len pa ni lha'i snying gar bcug pas rnal 'byor mngon sum bskyed pa'i byin rlabs kyis lam ston pa yin la /
translated: Receiving the powers from the deity is the path of the direct perception of the yogin, by the blessing of generating the deity in the heart of the deity, and the deity teaches the path.

original: rnal 'byor ma las dngos grub len pa ni stong pa nyid kyi lam mngon sum du rtogs pas mngon sum gyi lam yin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma las dngos grub len pa ni stong pa nyid kyi lam mngon sum du rtogs pas mngon sum gyi lam yin no //
translated: Receiving the powers from the yoginis is the path of direct perception, by directly realizing the path of emptiness.

original: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
translated: Having thus summarized the matter, the extensive explanation is as follows.

original: bud med gang spyi gtsug la reg pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: bud med gang spyi gtsug la reg pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The verse beginning “If a woman touches one’s crown” is stated.

original: bud med gang zhig ye shes dang zhing dang sngags las skyes pas so //
analyzed: bud med gang zhig ye shes dang zhing dang sngags las skyes pas so //
translated: A woman is born from the gnosis, the field, and the mantra.

original: de spyi gtsug la reg pa'i tshe kho mo la rtsa aa wa dh'u t'i nam mkha'i rtsa yod ces ston pa yin no //
analyzed: de spyi gtsug la reg pa'i tshe kho mo la rtsa aa wa dh'u t'i nam mkha'i rtsa yod ces ston pa yin no //
translated: When she touches one’s crown, she shows that one has the central channel, the avadhuti.

original: phyag rgya'i lan du //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i lan du //
translated: In response to the seal,

original: mgo bo de la bstan par bya //
analyzed: mgo bo de la bstan par bya //
translated: “one should show one’s head to her”

original: zhes bya ba ni kho bo'i bde ba ni stong pa nyid rtogs par 'dod ces smra ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kho bo'i bde ba ni stong pa nyid rtogs par 'dod ces smra ba yin no //
translated: means “I wish to realize emptiness, my bliss.”

original: de lta bu gang zhig dpral ba ston pa la sogs pa thams cad ni nam mkha'i rtsa ston par nus so zhes ston pa yin la /
analyzed: de lta bu gang zhig dpral ba ston pa la sogs pa thams cad ni nam mkha'i rtsa ston par nus so zhes ston pa yin la /
translated: All of these, such as showing the forehead, are taught to be able to show the space channel.

original: mkhur tshos ston pa la sogs pa lan gyi phyag rgya thams cad ni bde ba stong pa nyid mngon sum du sgom zhes ston pa yin no //
analyzed: mkhur tshos ston pa la sogs pa lan gyi phyag rgya thams cad ni bde ba stong pa nyid mngon sum du sgom zhes ston pa yin no //
translated: All of the reply gestures, such as showing the cheek, are taught to be the direct experience of bliss-emptiness.

original: brda mi 'dra ba mang po ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa bdun gyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: brda mi 'dra ba mang po ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa bdun gyi khyad par ro //
translated: The many different signs are the distinctions of the thirty-seven yoginīs of the gaṇacakra.

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the twenty-first chapter on the signs of the hero.

original: // / de ltar dpa' bo'i brda bstan nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar dpa' bo'i brda bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the signs of the hero,

original: bkas @399b gnang ba mchod pa'i lha mo'i bshad pa ni /
analyzed: bkas @399b gnang ba mchod pa'i lha mo'i bshad pa ni /
translated: the explanation of the goddess of offering, the permission, is as follows.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Next, I will explain🔽the goddess of offering, the permission.

original: yan lag ji bzhin cho ga bzhin //
analyzed: yan lag ji bzhin cho ga bzhin //
translated: As for “the limbs and the branches according to the rite,”

original: zhes bya ba ni nying lag gi sor mo'i brda'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nying lag gi sor mo'i brda'o //
translated: the signs of the fingers of the secondary limbs are as follows.

original: dgos pa ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: dgos pa ci zhig ce na /
translated: What is the purpose?

original: spun dang srin mor shes par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: spun dang srin mor shes par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: One will recognize the sister and the rākṣasī.

original: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /🔽sor mo gcig ston pa ni phyag 'tshal ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni / sor mo gcig ston pa ni phyag 'tshal ba'o //
translated: Having thus taught in brief, the extensive explanation is as follows.🔽Showing one finger is a salutation.

original: gnyis ston pa ni phyag 'tshal ba'i lan no //
analyzed: gnyis ston pa ni phyag 'tshal ba'i lan no //
translated: Showing two fingers is the response to the salutation.

original: 'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi //
analyzed: 'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi //
translated: This is of all the yoginis.

original: zhes bya ba ni dag byed kyi dbang gi lha mo dang dpa' bo'i lha mo bka' bsgo ba bskyed //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dag byed kyi dbang gi lha mo dang dpa' bo'i lha mo bka' bsgo ba bskyed //
translated: The goddess of the consecration empowerment and the goddess of the hero are generated as the command.

original: de 'og ma lus kun spyod ma ;
analyzed: de 'og ma lus kun spyod ma ;
translated: Then, the one who acts with the body.

original: / zhes bya ba ni rigs lnga'o //
analyzed: / zhes bya ba ni rigs lnga'o //
translated: This is the five families.

original: thun mong gi phyag 'tshal ba dang de'i lan yin no //
analyzed: thun mong gi phyag 'tshal ba dang de'i lan yin no //
translated: It is the common salutation and its response.

original: mdzub sor gnyis bkug mig gi rgya //
analyzed: mdzub sor gnyis bkug mig gi rgya //
translated: The two fingers bent are the eyes.

original: zhes pa ni aa wa dh'u t'i kha 'byed shes sam zhes dris pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni aa wa dh'u t'i kha 'byed shes sam zhes dris pa yin no //
translated: This is the question, “Do you know how to open the avadhūtī?”

original: sngags pas gang la de bstan te //
analyzed: sngags pas gang la de bstan te //
translated: The mantra practitioner shows that to whom?

original: zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i lha mo sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i lha mo sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o //
translated: This is the thirty-seven offering goddesses.

original: de'i phyag rgya'i lan du mdzub sor gnyis bkug nas de nas brtsams te ji srid 'tsho'i bar du brtan pa ni bde ba mi nyams pa la dbang thob par the tshom med do //
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya'i lan du mdzub sor gnyis bkug nas de nas brtsams te ji srid 'tsho'i bar du brtan pa ni bde ba mi nyams pa la dbang thob par the tshom med do //
translated: In response to her gesture, one should bend two fingers, and from that point on, one will undoubtedly attain stability, the power over undiminished bliss, for as long as one lives.

original: rdo rje phag mo lta bu gang zhig gung mo ston par byed na rnal 'byor pas mdzub mo bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo lta bu gang zhig gung mo ston par byed na rnal 'byor pas mdzub mo bstan par bya'o //
translated: If any woman like Vajravārāhī shows the middle finger, the yogī should show the index finger.

original: gang zhig srin lag ston pa ni rab tu gtum ma'o //
analyzed: gang zhig srin lag ston pa ni rab tu gtum ma'o //
translated: If she shows the ring finger, she is a fierce woman.

original: de nas brtsams te gang zhig dpral ba ston pa zhes bya ba tha mar bstan pa ni shing grib ma'i brda'o //
analyzed: de nas brtsams te gang zhig dpral ba ston pa zhes bya ba tha mar bstan pa ni shing grib ma'i brda'o //
translated: From that point on, if she shows the forehead, which is taught at the end, it is the sign of the shade of a tree.

original: de'i lan lce nas brtsams te lte ba'i bar du bstan pa ni dpa' mo'i brda ste /
analyzed: de'i lan lce nas brtsams te lte ba'i bar du bstan pa ni dpa' mo'i brda ste /
translated: In response to that, if she shows from the tongue up to the navel, it is the sign of a heroine.

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo la bstan pa bzhin du sku dang gsung la sogs pa la bstan pa yin no zhes bsgre bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo la bstan pa bzhin du sku dang gsung la sogs pa la bstan pa yin no zhes bsgre bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to show that it is the same for the body, speech, and so on, as it is for the mind wheel,

original: 'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi //
analyzed: 'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi //
translated: it is said, “This is for all yoginīs.

original: rim bzhin yan lag phyag rgya yi //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rim bzhin yan lag phyag rgya yi //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The gesture of the limbs is in order.”

original: thugs ji lta ba bzhin du gsung dang sku dang dam tshig mkha' 'gro ma las kyang go rims bzhin du yan lag phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: thugs ji lta ba bzhin du gsung dang sku dang dam tshig mkha' 'gro ma las kyang go rims bzhin du yan lag phyag rgya yin no //
translated: The speech, body, and commitments of the mind are the branch seals, respectively.

original: 'di dag rtags bdun bstan gsang ba //
analyzed: 'di dag rtags bdun bstan gsang ba //
translated: These are the seven signs taught in the secret.

original: zhes bya ba ni chags pa'i lam gsang ba pa rnal 'byor ma'i brda'i rtags shes nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chags pa'i lam gsang ba pa rnal 'byor ma'i brda'i rtags shes nas /
translated: Knowing the signs of the secret path of passion, the signs of the yoginīs,

original: yang dag lta ba grub par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ste /
analyzed: yang dag lta ba grub par 'gyur // zhes bya ste /
translated: one will accomplish the perfect view.

original: sa bcu gcig gi ye shes kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //🔽rnal 'byor pa kha dog dang dbyibs @400a * //
analyzed: sa bcu gcig gi ye shes kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro // rnal 'byor pa kha dog dang dbyibs @400a * //
translated: One will attain the spiritual power of the gnosis of the eleventh stage.

original: kyi mtshan nyid dang brda yang mi shes la rnal 'byor ma dbang bskur ba thob kyang brda mi shes na ji ltar rigs drug gi bdag nyid du shes par bya zhe na /
analyzed: kyi mtshan nyid dang brda yang mi shes la rnal 'byor ma dbang bskur ba thob kyang brda mi shes na ji ltar rigs drug gi bdag nyid du shes par bya zhe na /
translated: If the yogī does not know the characteristics of color and shape and the signs, and if the yoginī does not know the signs even though she has received empowerment, how should they know the nature of the six families?

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro las lha'i 'khor lo bris la me tog 'phang ba'am lag pas reg pa'am /
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro las lha'i 'khor lo bris la me tog 'phang ba'am lag pas reg pa'am /
translated: In the Vajraḍāka, it says that one should draw the divine wheel, cast a flower, touch it with the hand,

original: yi ge'i sde tshan lngar byas la lag pas reg pa'am /
analyzed: yi ge'i sde tshan lngar byas la lag pas reg pa'am /
translated: or make the five groups of letters, touch it with the hand,🔽and

original: me tog 'phangs na de'i rigs su shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: me tog 'phangs na de'i rigs su shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one throws flowers, one will know which family it is.

original: yi ge de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: yi ge de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What are those letters?

original: aa ring thung gnyis dang sde tshan lnga'i dang po lnga dang mthar gnas pa'i dang po gnyis kyi steng du yi ge bdun ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so //
analyzed: aa ring thung gnyis dang sde tshan lnga'i dang po lnga dang mthar gnas pa'i dang po gnyis kyi steng du yi ge bdun ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so //
translated: The seven letters, the two long and short a's, the first five of the five groups, and the first two of the last group, are the Tathagata family.

original: ai a'i gnyis dang sde tshan gyi gnyis pa lnga dang / mthar gnas kyi 'og gnyis dang dgu ni rin po che'i rigs so //
analyzed: ai a'i gnyis dang sde tshan gyi gnyis pa lnga dang / mthar gnas kyi 'og gnyis dang dgu ni rin po che'i rigs so //
translated: The nine letters, the two i and i, the five of the second group, and the last two of the last group, are the jewel family.

original: au a'u dang sde tshan gyi gsum pa lnga dang / mthar gnas kyi gnyis dang dgu ni padma'i rigs so //
analyzed: au a'u dang sde tshan gyi gsum pa lnga dang / mthar gnas kyi gnyis dang dgu ni padma'i rigs so //
translated: The nine letters, the two u and u, the five of the third group, and the last two of the last group, are the lotus family.

original: ae ai gnyis dang sde tshan gyi bzhi pa lnga dang dro ba dang mthar gnas kyi tha ma gnyis ni las kyi rigs so //
analyzed: ae ai gnyis dang sde tshan gyi bzhi pa lnga dang dro ba dang mthar gnas kyi tha ma gnyis ni las kyi rigs so //
translated: The two e and ai, the five of the fourth group, and the last two of the warm and last groups, are the action family.

original: ao aoo dang aam aa: dang dbyangs bzhi dang sde tshan gyi tha ma lnga dang / mthar gnas kyi dang po gnyis dang bdun ni rdo rje'i rigs so //
analyzed: ao aoo dang aam aa: dang dbyangs bzhi dang sde tshan gyi tha ma lnga dang / mthar gnas kyi dang po gnyis dang bdun ni rdo rje'i rigs so //
translated: The seven letters, the four vowels, the last five of the groups, and the first two of the last group, are the vajra family.

original: las dang po pas gzhan rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: las dang po pas gzhan rtogs pa'o //
translated: The beginner understands others.

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: The explanation of the twenty-second chapter.

original: // / de ltar dag byed dang dbang dang / dpa' bo dang bkas gnang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u bzhi dang brda'i le'u bstan nas kun spyod kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba ni /
analyzed: // / de ltar dag byed dang dbang dang / dpa' bo dang bkas gnang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u bzhi dang brda'i le'u bstan nas kun spyod kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba ni /
translated: Thus, having explained the four chapters on the characteristics of the purifier, empowerment, hero, and permission, and the chapter on the symbolic, now, the characteristics of conduct will be explained.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Now, moreover, what is to be explained

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan nyid de //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan nyid de // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: is the characteristics of the dakinis.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni kun spyod ma'i rigs te lnga'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni kun spyod ma'i rigs te lnga'o //
translated: Dakinis are of the type of conduct, and there are five.

original: gang gis shes na pho nya mo //
analyzed: gang gis shes na pho nya mo //
translated: By knowing which, one is a hero.

original: zhes bya ba ni kha dog dang dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid shes nas pho nya mo de las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kha dog dang dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid shes nas pho nya mo de las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'o //
translated: Having known the characteristics of color and shape, one accomplishes the activity consort dakini.

original: dpa' bo sring mor shes 'gyur ba //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dpa' bo sring mor shes 'gyur ba // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One will know the hero as a sister.

original: sngags skyes kyi lha mor shes pa'o //
analyzed: sngags skyes kyi lha mor shes pa'o //
translated: One will know the goddess born from mantra.

original: de ltar mdor bstan nas //
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan nas //
translated: Having explained that in brief,

original: rgyas par bshad pa ni /
analyzed: rgyas par bshad pa ni /
translated: the extensive explanation is as follows.

original: dam tshig can gang rjes chags pas //
analyzed: dam tshig can gang rjes chags pas //
translated: By whom one is devoted to the one who has the commitments.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: rnal 'byor ma bsgrub pa'i cho ga ston pa yin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma bsgrub pa'i cho ga ston pa yin no //
translated: It shows the rite of accomplishing the yoginī.

original: rnal 'byor ma dam tshig can gang yid du 'ong ba la rjes su chags pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma dam tshig can gang yid du 'ong ba la rjes su chags pa'o //
translated: The one who has the commitments of the yoginī is the one who is pleasing.

original: de ji ltar @400b sgrub ce na /
analyzed: de ji ltar @400b sgrub ce na /
translated: How is she accomplished?

original: rnal 'byor longs spyod sa gzhi yin //
analyzed: rnal 'byor longs spyod sa gzhi yin //
translated: The yogin’s enjoyment is the ground.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi lo tog bskyed pa'i sa gzhi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi lo tog bskyed pa'i sa gzhi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The karmamudrā is the ground for producing the crop of the meditative concentration of meditative stabilization.

original: de yang mnyam sbyor las //
analyzed: de yang mnyam sbyor las //
translated: Moreover, the Samputa Tantra says:

original: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las //
analyzed: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las //
translated: Among all the illusions

original: bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags // zhes gsungs so //
translated: The illusion of a woman is supreme.

original: gzhi ni sa gzhir byas nas ni //🔽zhes bya ba ni dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang / sngags kyi dam tshig byin pas sa gzhir byas nas /
analyzed: gzhi ni sa gzhir byas nas ni // zhes bya ba ni dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang / sngags kyi dam tshig byin pas sa gzhir byas nas /
translated: Having made the ground the ground,

original: rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi 'khor lo sdom pa mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi 'khor lo sdom pa mchod par bya'o //
translated: Having given the vows of the upāsaka, the vows of the bodhisattva, and the commitments of the mantra, one should make an offering to the yogin’s body cakrasaṃvara.

original: gsang ba 'dus pa dang kha sbyor las /
analyzed: gsang ba 'dus pa dang kha sbyor las /
translated: The Guhyasamaja and the Union say:

original: mi yi bud med ma rnyed na //🔽khams blta dud 'gro bsten par bya'o //
analyzed: mi yi bud med ma rnyed na // khams blta dud 'gro bsten par bya'o //
translated: If you do not find a human woman,

original: zhes gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa ste /
translated: you should rely on an animal who has the right elements.

original: sgra'i khams las drangs nas 'khor ba'i 'gram las pha rol tu rgal bar byed pa'i las kyi phyag rgya kun spyod ma 'di la bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra'i khams las drangs nas 'khor ba'i 'gram las pha rol tu rgal bar byed pa'i las kyi phyag rgya kun spyod ma 'di la bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is explained as the karma mudra of conduct, who is drawn from the element of sound and causes you to cross over to the far shore of samsara.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de yang rdo rje rtse mo las dud 'gro ste /🔽'khor ba'i chu bo rgal dka' bas //
analyzed: de yang rdo rje rtse mo las dud 'gro ste / 'khor ba'i chu bo rgal dka' bas //
translated: The Vajra Peak Tantra says:

original: sems can dag ni thams cad gnas //🔽ci ltar mi shes rmongs 'gyur ba //
analyzed: sems can dag ni thams cad gnas // ci ltar mi shes rmongs 'gyur ba //
translated: All sentient beings live in the river of samsara, difficult to cross.🔽How do I liberate them?

original: de bzhin nga yis sgrol bar byed //
analyzed: de bzhin nga yis sgrol bar byed //
translated: I liberate them in the same way that they are confused.

original: ces gsungs pa'i phyir kun spyod ma byol song gi lam zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa'i phyir kun spyod ma byol song gi lam zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the karma mudra of conduct is called the animal path.

original: bsgrub pa bshad nas thun mong gi rtags bstan pa ni go bzlog pa ni zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: bsgrub pa bshad nas thun mong gi rtags bstan pa ni go bzlog pa ni zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Having explained the practice, the common signs are indicated:

original: mig phab nas zur mig blta ba'o //
analyzed: mig phab nas zur mig blta ba'o //
translated: The reverse is looking down with sidelong glances.

original: bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba ni chags pas khyab pas bde ba'o //
analyzed: bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba ni chags pas khyab pas bde ba'o //
translated: The face is transformed, and the bliss is pervaded by passion.

original: rtag tu bzhin gyi smin ma g-yo //
analyzed: rtag tu bzhin gyi smin ma g-yo //
translated: The eyebrows are always moving.

original: sna tshogs myur du shes bya ba //
analyzed: sna tshogs myur du shes bya ba //
translated: One should know the various [signs] quickly.

original: zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'i dus mtshon pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'i dus mtshon pa yin no //
translated: This indicates the time of joy.

original: rnam par smin pa dang rnam par bskyod pa dang mtshan nyid dang bral ba ni shugs kyis go bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa dang rnam par bskyod pa dang mtshan nyid dang bral ba ni shugs kyis go bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The signs of the gnosis of discernment are understood by implication.

original: de bzhin mkha' 'gro 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin mkha' 'gro 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Likewise, the dakinis are transformed.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi lha mo bzhin du 'dir yang mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs su 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi lha mo bzhin du 'dir yang mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs su 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Just as the goddesses were previously, here one should understand that the dakinis are of the same type.

original: de ltar sku'i rigs bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar sku'i rigs bshad pa ni /
translated: Thus, having explained the family of the body,

original: rnam 'gyur 'khor ba zhes byas te /
analyzed: rnam 'gyur 'khor ba zhes byas te /
translated: the transformation is called “samsara.”

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: bzhin bsgyur zhing dag gi dkyil 'khor bskur ba dang / ri mo gsum dpral ba na yod pa ni sku'i rigs su nges par 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: bzhin bsgyur zhing dag gi dkyil 'khor bskur ba dang / ri mo gsum dpral ba na yod pa ni sku'i rigs su nges par 'gro ba'o //
translated: The face is transformed, the circle of the mouth is filled, and three lines are on the forehead—this is ascertained to be the family of the body.

original: thugs kyi @401a * //
analyzed: thugs kyi @401a * //
translated: The family of the mind is as follows.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni /
translated: The dakinis

original: gal te ldog par gyur na ni //
analyzed: gal te ldog par gyur na ni //
translated: if they turn away,

original: zhes bya ba la gal te bsam par gyur na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la gal te bsam par gyur na /
translated: If one should think thus,

original: sngar bshad pa'i don rtog med bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa gtogs pas de'i gdong rnam par 'jigs pa bzhin 'gyur ba ste rdo rje lta bu'i skad gsal por smra ba yin no //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i don rtog med bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa gtogs pas de'i gdong rnam par 'jigs pa bzhin 'gyur ba ste rdo rje lta bu'i skad gsal por smra ba yin no //
translated: one should speak with a voice like the sound of a vajra, clear, since one is engaged in the meditative concentration that generates the previously explained meaning without conceptual thought.

original: gsung gi rigs ni sgra khu byug ltar gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: gsung gi rigs ni sgra khu byug ltar gsal ba yin no //
translated: The speech type is clear like the sound of a cuckoo.

original: de kun spyod pa la rigs lnga ston pa ni khyim du rdo rje me long 'dri na nam mkha'i rtsa yod pas snyoms par 'jug pa sngar ston pas thugs kyi rigs dang / ral gri me long dang bcas pas rin po che'i rigs dang / rgyal mtshan me long dang bcas pas padma'i rigs dang /
analyzed: de kun spyod pa la rigs lnga ston pa ni khyim du rdo rje me long 'dri na nam mkha'i rtsa yod pas snyoms par 'jug pa sngar ston pas thugs kyi rigs dang / ral gri me long dang bcas pas rin po che'i rigs dang / rgyal mtshan me long dang bcas pas padma'i rigs dang /
translated: The teaching of the five types in the conduct is as follows: If one draws a vajra mirror in the house, since the channel of space exists, one should first teach the meditative concentration.

original: mdung me long dang bcas pas sku'i rigs dang / me long kha sbyor 'dri ba'i mtshan nyid 'di dag dang ldan pa'i mkha' 'gro ma kun spyod ma rnams kyi nang nas mchog yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: mdung me long dang bcas pas sku'i rigs dang / me long kha sbyor 'dri ba'i mtshan nyid 'di dag dang ldan pa'i mkha' 'gro ma kun spyod ma rnams kyi nang nas mchog yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know that among the dakinis of conduct who have these characteristics of the mirror-spear and the mirror-kiss, the one with the mirror is supreme.

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /🔽// / de ltar kun spyod ma'i mtshan nyid bshad nas de'i brda bshad pa ni /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o / // / de ltar kun spyod ma'i mtshan nyid bshad nas de'i brda bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the twenty-third chapter.

original: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
translated: Having explained the characteristics of the conduct dakini, the explanation of her signs is as follows.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Now, I will explain🔽the signs of the yoginis.

original: sgrub pa po'i brda rnams byas pas spun dang srin mor shes par 'gyur ba ni dgos pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa po'i brda rnams byas pas spun dang srin mor shes par 'gyur ba ni dgos pa'o //
translated: The purpose is that by the practitioner making the signs, the sister and the rakshasa will be recognized.

original: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni po tanggi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni po tanggi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Having explained that in brief, the extensive explanation is stated with “po tang” and so on.

original: kha sbyor las dngos grub sgrub pa'i tshe bza' ba dang bcas pa'i spyod pa btul nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brdar gyur ba'i spyod pa la zhugs pa dang dngos grub len pa'i thabs su gsungs so //
analyzed: kha sbyor las dngos grub sgrub pa'i tshe bza' ba dang bcas pa'i spyod pa btul nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brdar gyur ba'i spyod pa la zhugs pa dang dngos grub len pa'i thabs su gsungs so //
translated: In the Kha-sbyor, it is said that when one is practicing for the attainment of siddhi, one should subdue the conduct of eating and so forth, and engage in the conduct which is the sign of the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas, and the method of taking the siddhi.

original: ci'i phyir thabs yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir thabs yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it a method?

original: zag pa med pa'i brda yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i brda yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the sign of the undefiled.🔽Having first made obeisance, the words ga-mu and lumba indicate coming and going.🔽From the word dehi up to amrita-ni are the signs of the consecration.

original: thog mar phyag 'tshal nas ga mu: dang lump'a zhes 'gro 'ong ston pa dang / de hi zhes bya ba nas brtsams te aa mri ta na'i bar gyis dbang bskur ba'i rtags dang / sa ga mo nas zhes bya ba'i bar gyis tshogs kyi 'khor lo yan lag gi brda'o //
analyzed: thog mar phyag 'tshal nas ga mu: dang lump'a zhes 'gro 'ong ston pa dang / de hi zhes bya ba nas brtsams te aa mri ta na'i bar gyis dbang bskur ba'i rtags dang / sa ga mo nas zhes bya ba'i bar gyis tshogs kyi 'khor lo yan lag gi brda'o //
translated: From the word sagamo up to the end are the signs of the limbs of the ganacakra.

original: kunta zhes bya ba nas aanta zhes bya ba'i par gyis mchod pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: kunta zhes bya ba nas aanta zhes bya ba'i par gyis mchod pa'i yan lag go //
translated: From the word kunta up to the word anta are the limbs of the worship.

original: sha nam zhes bya ba nas brla la reg pa zhes bya ba'i bar @401b gyis khams lta ba'i yan lag go //
analyzed: sha nam zhes bya ba nas brla la reg pa zhes bya ba'i bar @401b gyis khams lta ba'i yan lag go //
translated: From the word sanam up to the word touching the thigh are the limbs of looking at the bhaga.

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi ba'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi ba'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: Chapter Twenty-four

original: // / de ltar le'u lngas lha mo'i brda bshad nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u lngas lha mo'i brda bshad nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the goddess's symbols with five chapters,

original: lha mo dang rnal 'byor pa'i lus la lha dgod nas mchod pa bya ba ni /
analyzed: lha mo dang rnal 'byor pa'i lus la lha dgod nas mchod pa bya ba ni /
translated: the worship is performed by placing the deities in the bodies of the goddess and the yogī.

original: de nas don kun 'dod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nas don kun 'dod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Then, then all the desired goals and so on are mentioned.

original: dngos grub kyi don thams cad bskyed pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: dngos grub kyi don thams cad bskyed pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags so //
translated: The root mantra that generates all the goals of spiritual powers.

original: bya ba byed pa ni yi ge btu ba'i tshe mi gsal ba /
analyzed: bya ba byed pa ni yi ge btu ba'i tshe mi gsal ba /
translated: The action is the unclear [mantra] when extracting the syllables.

original: rnal 'byor pa mos pa dman pa'i sems can rmongs shing mi shes par 'gyur pas rtsa ba'i gsang sngags gsal bar gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa mos pa dman pa'i sems can rmongs shing mi shes par 'gyur pas rtsa ba'i gsang sngags gsal bar gsungs pa'o //
translated: Since the yogī is a sentient being of inferior aspiration, being deluded and ignorant, the root mantra is stated clearly.

original: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i lus la dgod pa'i sngags yi ge btu ba'i tshe mi gsal ba gsungs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i lus la dgod pa'i sngags yi ge btu ba'i tshe mi gsal ba gsungs pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: Having thus explained in brief, the extensive explanation is the unclear mantra that is placed in the bodies of the hero and yoginī when extracting the syllables.

original: na mo bha ga wa te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: na mo bha ga wa te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is namaḥ bhagavate and so on.

original: rkang pa brgyad po des bdud rtsi lnga dang cang te'u dang chang dang 'khyud pa'i lha mo brgyad kyis mchod pa yin no //
analyzed: rkang pa brgyad po des bdud rtsi lnga dang cang te'u dang chang dang 'khyud pa'i lha mo brgyad kyis mchod pa yin no //
translated: The eight lines are the offerings of the eight goddesses of nectar, hand drum, wine, and embrace.

original: kar kar zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi dgod pa dang / sku gsung thugs kyi dpa' mo sum cu rtsa bdun pa dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: kar kar zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi dgod pa dang / sku gsung thugs kyi dpa' mo sum cu rtsa bdun pa dgod par bya'o //
translated: The twenty-four heroes beginning with “karkara” and the thirty-seven heroines of body, speech, and mind should be placed.

original: h'um dang phat kyi mtshams ma phye ba'i rtsa ba'i sngags 'di ni rnal 'byor ma la ye shes 'bebs pas na gsang ba'i tshig gi le'u zhes bya bar gsungs te /
analyzed: h'um dang phat kyi mtshams ma phye ba'i rtsa ba'i sngags 'di ni rnal 'byor ma la ye shes 'bebs pas na gsang ba'i tshig gi le'u zhes bya bar gsungs te /
translated: This root mantra, which is not divided into the sections of hūṃ and phaṭ, is said to be the “secret word chapter” because it is the descent of wisdom into the yoginīs.

original: rnal 'byor ma sgrub pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma sgrub pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: This is the ritual for accomplishing the yoginīs.

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the twenty-fifth chapter.

original: // / de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo le'u bcu gnyis bshad nas /🔽le'u dang po rdzogs pa'i rim pa rgyas par bshad pa bstan pa ni ;
analyzed: // / de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo le'u bcu gnyis bshad nas / le'u dang po rdzogs pa'i rim pa rgyas par bshad pa bstan pa ni ;
translated: Thus, having explained the gaṇacakra in twelve chapters,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: the explanation of the perfection stage in detail, which is the first chapter, is taught by “then” and so forth.

original: gzhan yang 'jig rten ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'jig rten ni /
translated: Moreover, the world

original: gsum po dag na yod min pa //
analyzed: gsum po dag na yod min pa //
translated: They do not exist in the three.

original: zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa las gzhan pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang zhi ba'i btung ba dang pho nya'i gtsang sbra ni sa 'og dang / sa steng dang / sa bla gsum du rnyed par dka' ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa las gzhan pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang zhi ba'i btung ba dang pho nya'i gtsang sbra ni sa 'og dang / sa steng dang / sa bla gsum du rnyed par dka' ba'o //
translated: The three are the lower, the middle, and the upper realms.

original: yang na 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med par rnyed par dka' bas na yod min pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yang na 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med par rnyed par dka' bas na yod min pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Or, they are the desire, form, and formless realms.

original: shr'i he ru ka'i sngags shes na //
analyzed: shr'i he ru ka'i sngags shes na //
translated: Knowing the mantra of Śrī Heruka,

original: zhes bya ba ni yid skyob par byed pa'i gsang sngags te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yid skyob par byed pa'i gsang sngags te /
translated: the mantra that protects the mind,

original: gtsang sbra rnam pa gsum mo //🔽gsang @402a * //
analyzed: gtsang sbra rnam pa gsum mo // gsang @402a * //
translated: the three kinds of purity,

original: sngags thams cad yongs dor ba //
analyzed: sngags thams cad yongs dor ba //
translated: and all the secret mantras,

original: zhes bya ba ni spyod pa dang bya ba dang gnyis ka dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi sngags thams cad yongs su 'dor ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni spyod pa dang bya ba dang gnyis ka dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi sngags thams cad yongs su 'dor ba'o //
translated: one should abandon all the secret mantras of the Action, Performance, and Yoga Tantras.

original: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
translated: Having thus summarized, he now explains in detail:

original: rim dang rim min bzlog pa yis ;
analyzed: rim dang rim min bzlog pa yis ;
translated: By reversing the sequence and the non-sequence,

original: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: rim dang rim las bzlog pa gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: rim dang rim las bzlog pa gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the sequence and reverse sequence?

original: pho nya rnams zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: pho nya rnams zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said, “of the messengers.”

original: pho nya ni phyag rgya bzhi ste las dang chos dang dam tshig dang phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: pho nya ni phyag rgya bzhi ste las dang chos dang dam tshig dang phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The messengers are the four seals, the action seal, the Dharma seal, the pledge seal, and the great seal.

original: de dag gang mtshan nyid ni rim dang rim las bzlog pa'o ;
analyzed: de dag gang mtshan nyid ni rim dang rim las bzlog pa'o ;
translated: Their characteristics are the sequence and reverse sequence.

original: / chags pa'i lam pa'i las kyi phyag rgya'i dbang du byas na g-yas skor dang g-yon skor gyis bkod pa ni rim dang rim las bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: / chags pa'i lam pa'i las kyi phyag rgya'i dbang du byas na g-yas skor dang g-yon skor gyis bkod pa ni rim dang rim las bzlog pa'o //
translated: In terms of the action seal of the path of passion, the arrangement in a clockwise and counterclockwise direction is the sequence and reverse sequence.

original: grol ba'i lam pa'i dbang du byas pa'i chos dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni dbugs phyir rgyu ba dang / nad du 'jug pa'i rim dang rim las bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: grol ba'i lam pa'i dbang du byas pa'i chos dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni dbugs phyir rgyu ba dang / nad du 'jug pa'i rim dang rim las bzlog pa'o //
translated: In terms of the Dharma seal and pledge seal of the path of liberation, the sequence of exhalation and inhalation is the sequence and reverse sequence.

original: rang lhag par gnas pa'i dbang du byas nas sgyu ma lta bu dang stong pa nyid ni rim dang rim las bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: rang lhag par gnas pa'i dbang du byas nas sgyu ma lta bu dang stong pa nyid ni rim dang rim las bzlog pa'o //
translated: In terms of the illusion-like and emptiness of the path of self-consecration, the sequence and reverse sequence are the sequence and reverse sequence.

original: mtshan nyid de dang ldan pa'i pho nya mo rnams ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum du skye ba'i rgyur yang dag gnas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid de dang ldan pa'i pho nya mo rnams ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum du skye ba'i rgyur yang dag gnas zhes bya'o //
translated: The messengers who are endowed with those characteristics are said to be the cause of the direct generation of śamatha and vipaśyanā.

original: des 'bras bu cir 'gyur zhe na /🔽'og dang steng grub rtag tu ster //
analyzed: des 'bras bu cir 'gyur zhe na / 'og dang steng grub rtag tu ster //
translated: What is the result of that?

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It always bestows the attainments of the lower and the higher.

original: 'og ni sku'i dngos grub po //
analyzed: 'og ni sku'i dngos grub po //
translated: The lower is the attainment of the body.

original: steng ni thugs kyi dngos grub bo //
analyzed: steng ni thugs kyi dngos grub bo //
translated: The higher is the attainment of the mind.

original: steng gi sgras 'phangs pas sa spyod gsung gi dngos grub 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: steng gi sgras 'phangs pas sa spyod gsung gi dngos grub 'grub pa'o //
translated: The implication of the word higher is the attainment of the speech of the bhūmi-goers.

original: rtag tu ster zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi rgyu nus pa thogs med yin pas 'bras bu skye bar gdon mi za ba'o //
analyzed: rtag tu ster zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi rgyu nus pa thogs med yin pas 'bras bu skye bar gdon mi za ba'o //
translated: Always bestows means that since the four mudras are unimpeded in their ability to cause, the result will definitely arise.

original: dngos grub thams cad ji ltar ster bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad ji ltar ster bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does one bestow all attainments?

original: bdag gi pho nya mo kun 'gro //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: bdag gi pho nya mo kun 'gro // zhes gsungs te /
translated: My messenger is all-pervading.

original: dngos grub gsum la khyab pas na kun 'gro'o //
analyzed: dngos grub gsum la khyab pas na kun 'gro'o //
translated: Since it pervades the three attainments, it is all-pervading.

original: pho nya mo de kun grub ster //
analyzed: pho nya mo de kun grub ster //
translated: That messenger bestows all attainments.

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyu yin pa des na dngos grub ster par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyu yin pa des na dngos grub ster par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since this is the cause, one will be granted spiritual powers.

original: de ltar bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu bshad nas dad pa'i 'bras bu ni /
analyzed: de ltar bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu bshad nas dad pa'i 'bras bu ni /
translated: Having explained the result of practice, the result of faith is mentioned:

original: mthong dang de bzhin reg pa dang / zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: mthong dang de bzhin reg pa dang / zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Seeing and likewise touching,

original: grol ba'i lam pa'i byang chub sems dpas yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs mthong ba nas @402b brtsams te /
analyzed: grol ba'i lam pa'i byang chub sems dpas yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs mthong ba nas @402b brtsams te /
translated: The bodhisattva on the path of liberation, beginning with seeing a pleasing form,

original: sgra thos pa dang dri bsnams pa dang ro myangs pa dang yid du 'ong ba'i reg bya'i bar du'o //
analyzed: sgra thos pa dang dri bsnams pa dang ro myangs pa dang yid du 'ong ba'i reg bya'i bar du'o //
translated: hears a sound, smells an odor, tastes a flavor, and experiences a pleasing tactile object.

original: de yang chags pa'i lam pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: de yang chags pa'i lam pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: Moreover, from the perspective of one on the path of passion,

original: tsumpa na dang rtag tu 'khyud //
analyzed: tsumpa na dang rtag tu 'khyud //

original: ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ces bya ba smos te /
translated: are mentioned.

analyzed: khas kha la reg pa dang 'khyud pa dang snyoms par zhugs pa la sogs pas nam mkha'i rtsa'i reg bya yul du byas pa'o //
translated: The tactile sensation of the avadhūti is experienced through kissing, embracing, union, and so on.

original: rnal 'byor gnas pa'i khyad par nyid //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gnas pa'i khyad par nyid //

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: is mentioned.

analyzed: pho nya'i lam pa'i rnal 'byor dang grol ba'i lam dang rang lhag par gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: The yogi/nis of the path of the messenger, the path of liberation, and the yogi/nis of the special abode.

original: gnas kyi khyad par ni phyag rgya'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhir phye ba'o //
analyzed: gnas kyi khyad par ni phyag rgya'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhir phye ba'o //

original: ji srid rnal 'byor tshogs rnams ni //
analyzed: ji srid rnal 'byor tshogs rnams ni //
translated: As long as the assemblies of yogi/nis

original: zhes bya ba ni chags pa'i lam dang grol ba'i lam dang rang lhag par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chags pa'i lam dang grol ba'i lam dang rang lhag par gnas pa'o //
translated: are on the path of passion, the path of liberation, and the special abode.

original: thams cad dngos grub byed par bshad //
analyzed: thams cad dngos grub byed par bshad //
translated: It is explained that all are successful.

original: ces bya ba ni phyag rgya gsum gyis bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bskyad pa dang phyag rgya chen pos zag pa med pa lhag mthong thob pas ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni phyag rgya gsum gyis bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bskyad pa dang phyag rgya chen pos zag pa med pa lhag mthong thob pas ni /
translated: The three seals manifest the samadhi of concentration of meditation, and by attaining the uncontaminated insight of the great seal,

original: thams cad dngos grub byed par bshad //
analyzed: thams cad dngos grub byed par bshad //
translated: it is explained that all are successful.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de ltar grub pa'i 'bras bu dang po'i 'bras bu gnyis bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar grub pa'i 'bras bu dang po'i 'bras bu gnyis bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the result of the first stage and the result of the second stage,

original: da ni rgyu ston pa yin te /
analyzed: da ni rgyu ston pa yin te /
translated: now the cause is taught.

original: bde ba kun la sbyin bya yi //
analyzed: bde ba kun la sbyin bya yi //
translated: It is the giver of all bliss.

original: zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas bde ba dang lhag mthong stong pa nyid mngon sum du byed par sbyin par bya zhes sa bon ston pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas bde ba dang lhag mthong stong pa nyid mngon sum du byed par sbyin par bya zhes sa bon ston pa yin no //
translated: This is the seed of the statement: “One should give the bliss of śamatha and the emptiness of vipaśyanā.”

original: gzhan du nam yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du nam yang ma yin no //
translated: It is never given to anyone else.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the statement:

original: rnam bshad ni rnam pa bdun te sde snod gsum la gnas pa'i go rims lam du byed pa dang / rgyud sde bzhi la bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dbang thob pa rnams la nam yang sbyin par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rnam bshad ni rnam pa bdun te sde snod gsum la gnas pa'i go rims lam du byed pa dang / rgyud sde bzhi la bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dbang thob pa rnams la nam yang sbyin par mi bya'o //
translated: The explanation is sevenfold: It is never given to those who take the order of the three baskets as the path, or to those who have obtained empowerment in the generation stage of the four classes of tantra.

original: bde can kun zhes bya ba gang yin zhe na //
analyzed: bde can kun zhes bya ba gang yin zhe na //
translated: What is meant by “all those who are happy”?🔽“Mother” refers to the vajra master who confers empowerment at the same time.

original: ma dang zhes bya ba rdo rje slob dpon dang dbang dus gcig tu bskur ba dang / sring mo ni rang dang lhan cig tu dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: ma dang zhes bya ba rdo rje slob dpon dang dbang dus gcig tu bskur ba dang / sring mo ni rang dang lhan cig tu dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: “Sister” refers to those who are empowered together with oneself.

original: bu mo ni rang gis dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: bu mo ni rang gis dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: “Daughter” refers to those who are empowered by oneself.

original: chung ma ni bla mas gnang ba'o //
analyzed: chung ma ni bla mas gnang ba'o //
translated: “Wife” refers to those who are permitted by the guru.

original: de rnams shugs kyi rdo rje slob dpon dang bdag nyid dang rang gis dbang bskur ba'i slob ma dang / rnal 'byor ma la ltos te rnal 'byor pa rnams kyang mtshon pa yin no //
analyzed: de rnams shugs kyi rdo rje slob dpon dang bdag nyid dang rang gis dbang bskur ba'i slob ma dang / rnal 'byor ma la ltos te rnal 'byor pa rnams kyang mtshon pa yin no //
translated: Those are the vajra master, oneself, and the disciple who is initiated by oneself, and the yogis are also indicated in terms of the yoginis.

original: gang zhig rtag tu sngags sbyin pa //🔽zhes bya ba ni yid skyob par @403a * //
analyzed: gang zhig rtag tu sngags sbyin pa // zhes bya ba ni yid skyob par @403a * //
translated: He who always gives the mantra🔽is the one who gives the empowerment of that mantra that protects the mind.

original: byed pa'i sngags de'i dbang byin pa rnal 'byor pa de rnams kyi gtsang sbra gsum po de nyid mngon sum gyi lam gyi cho gar bshad do //
analyzed: byed pa'i sngags de'i dbang byin pa rnal 'byor pa de rnams kyi gtsang sbra gsum po de nyid mngon sum gyi lam gyi cho gar bshad do //
translated: Those yogis' three purities are explained as the ritual of the path of direct realization.

original: de ltar rten gyi gang zag bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar rten gyi gang zag bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the person who is the basis in that way,

original: da ni thabs ston pa ni /
analyzed: da ni thabs ston pa ni /
translated: now the method is taught.

original: de nas rnal 'byor rgyud du ni //
analyzed: de nas rnal 'byor rgyud du ni //
translated: Then, in the yoga tantra,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so on is stated.

original: rnal 'byor rgyud ni phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di nyid yin te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor rgyud ni phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di nyid yin te /
translated: The yoga tantra is this very Later Tantra,

original: thabs kyi rgyud lnga dang shes rab kyi rgyud bzhi las gos dkar mo'i rgyud yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs kyi rgyud lnga dang shes rab kyi rgyud bzhi las gos dkar mo'i rgyud yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the White Khecarī Tantra from among the five method tantras and the four wisdom tantras.

original: rnyed dka'i dam tshig nga yis bshad //
analyzed: rnyed dka'i dam tshig nga yis bshad //
translated: I will explain the difficult-to-find pledge.

original: ces bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po'i ting nge 'dzin dngos su bskyed pa'i thabs ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo yin pas ngas bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po'i ting nge 'dzin dngos su bskyed pa'i thabs ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo yin pas ngas bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is the method for directly generating the concentration of the first meditation, which is the wheel of the assembly, which I have explained.

original: skyes pa bud med g-yon nas 'gro //
analyzed: skyes pa bud med g-yon nas 'gro //
translated: Men and women go to the left.

original: zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas bde ba dang lhag mthong stong pa nyid kyi bde ba mngon sum mo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas bde ba dang lhag mthong stong pa nyid kyi bde ba mngon sum mo //
translated: This is the bliss of serenity and the bliss of emptiness, the insight.

original: 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed //
translated: It bestows the desired power.

original: ces bya ba ni zhi gnas dang bde ba mngon sum du bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni zhi gnas dang bde ba mngon sum du bskyed pa'o //
translated: This is the generation of the bliss of serenity.

original: rigs ldan rnams ni mchod par bya //
analyzed: rigs ldan rnams ni mchod par bya //
translated: The adepts should be worshipped.

original: zhes le'u dang por gsungs pa bshad par bzhed nas /
analyzed: zhes le'u dang por gsungs pa bshad par bzhed nas /
translated: Desiring to explain what was said in the first chapter,

original: khyim dang zhing du rnam gnas pa //
analyzed: khyim dang zhing du rnam gnas pa //
translated: Dwelling in the house and field,

original: zhes bya ba ni khyim ye shes pa'i 'khor lo ni khyim mo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khyim ye shes pa'i 'khor lo ni khyim mo //
translated: The house is the house of the wheel of gnosis.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo ni zhing ngo //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo ni zhing ngo //
translated: The field is the wheel of body, speech, and mind.

original: rnam gnas ni dam tshig gi 'khor lo ste gnas brgyad do //
analyzed: rnam gnas ni dam tshig gi 'khor lo ste gnas brgyad do //
translated: Dwelling is the wheel of commitment, the eight abodes.

original: de skad du yang kun spyod las //
analyzed: de skad du yang kun spyod las //
translated: Thus it is also in the Conduct:

original: khyim lnga dang ni yul rnams dang // zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: khyim lnga dang ni yul rnams dang // zhes gsungs so //
translated: the five houses and the countries.

original: shin tu ring yang shes par 'gyur //
analyzed: shin tu ring yang shes par 'gyur //
translated: Even if very far away, they will know.

original: zhes bya ba ni kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod lam dang brda rnam pa gsum gyis gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhir skyes kyang phan tshun rnal 'byor bar shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod lam dang brda rnam pa gsum gyis gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhir skyes kyang phan tshun rnal 'byor bar shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if born in the twenty-four holy places, they will know each other as practitioners by means of the three kinds of signs: color, shape, and behavior.

original: de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshad nas zhi ba'i btung ba bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshad nas zhi ba'i btung ba bshad pa ni /
translated: Having explained the gaṇa cakra, the drinking of the peace offering is explained:

original: he ru ka las sbyor gzhan med //
analyzed: he ru ka las sbyor gzhan med //
translated: There is no union with Heruka other than this.

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: ro rdo rje ma la sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa ni he ru ka la sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: ro rdo rje ma la sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa ni he ru ka la sbyor ba'o //
translated: The realization of Vajraḍākinī as illusion is the union with Heruka.

original: gzhan med ces bya ba ni zhi ba'i btung ba las gzhan med pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan med ces bya ba ni zhi ba'i btung ba las gzhan med pa'o //
translated: “No other” means there is no other than the peace offering.

original: slob dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid yin //
analyzed: slob dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid yin //
translated: The master is a yoginī herself.

original: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i btung ba'i rgyu tshogs pa yin pas na slob dpon zhes rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i btung ba'i rgyu tshogs pa yin pas na slob dpon zhes rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Since the master is the cause of the assembly of the peace offering, he is understood to be a master.

original: rgyu 'di rnams su sgrub pa po //
analyzed: rgyu 'di rnams su sgrub pa po //
translated: The adept is in these causes.
