original: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i btung ba bsgom pa'i @403b rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i btung ba bsgom pa'i @403b rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: This is the yogi/nī who meditates on the drink of peace.

original: legs par gyur pa nyid yin te //
analyzed: legs par gyur pa nyid yin te //
translated: It is excellent itself,

original: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'o //
translated: free from the eighty natural [defilements].

original: brnyas mi bya zhing spang mi bya //
analyzed: brnyas mi bya zhing spang mi bya //
translated: One should not despise it, nor reject it.

original: zhes bya ba ni bde ba sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa'i rgyu yin pas lus ngag gis brnyas par mi bya zhing sems kyis spang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bde ba sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa'i rgyu yin pas lus ngag gis brnyas par mi bya zhing sems kyis spang bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not despise it with body and speech, nor reject it with the mind, because it is the cause for realizing bliss that is like an illusion.

original: nus pa yis ni mchod par bya //
analyzed: nus pa yis ni mchod par bya //
translated: One should worship it with ability.

original: zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i tshe na 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas mnyes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i tshe na 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas mnyes par bya'o //
translated: One should please it with the five sensual qualities at the time of practice.

original: de bzhin zhi ba'i btung ba bshad nas pho nya'i gtsang sbra bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin zhi ba'i btung ba bshad nas pho nya'i gtsang sbra bshad pa ni /
translated: Having explained the drink of peace in this way, [the Bhagavān] explains the purity of the messenger:

original: k'a ka la sogs brgyad po ni //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: k'a ka la sogs brgyad po ni // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The eight, the crow and so forth,🔽are the eight goddesses.

original: pho nya'i gtsang sbra'i thog mar zag pa med pa'i sdom pa bsrungs la k'a ka la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad kyis srung bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: pho nya'i gtsang sbra'i thog mar zag pa med pa'i sdom pa bsrungs la k'a ka la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad kyis srung bar byed pa yin no //
translated: At the beginning of the purity of the messenger, one should guard the uncontaminated vow, and the eight goddesses, the crow and so forth, will protect one.

original: k'a la sogs pa brgyad ni rnam rgyal la sogs pa brgyad yin pas des bsrung ba yin te de yang rgyud bla ma las /
analyzed: k'a la sogs pa brgyad ni rnam rgyal la sogs pa brgyad yin pas des bsrung ba yin te de yang rgyud bla ma las /
translated: The eight beginning with ka are the eight beginning with Vajravidāraṇa, so they are the protectors.🔽The Supreme Continuity states:

original: rnam rgyal la sogs khro bo rnams //🔽k'a ka la sogs yang dag sprul //
analyzed: rnam rgyal la sogs khro bo rnams // k'a ka la sogs yang dag sprul //
translated: The wrathful ones beginning with Vajravidāraṇa

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: are the emanations of the eight beginning with Kākāsyā.

original: mos dang dad pa 'phel byed pa //
analyzed: mos dang dad pa 'phel byed pa //
translated: Increasing devotion and faith

original: zhes bya ba la rnam shes la mos pa 'phel ba dang ye shes la dad pa 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rnam shes la mos pa 'phel ba dang ye shes la dad pa 'phel ba'o //
translated: means increasing devotion to consciousness and increasing faith in pristine consciousness.

original: rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu //
analyzed: rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu //
translated: Always the cause of powers

original: zhes bya ba ni phyis 'byung ba'i dam tshig brgyad do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyis 'byung ba'i dam tshig brgyad do //
translated: refers to the eight later pledges.

original: dam tshig rnams kyang spyod pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig rnams kyang spyod pa'o //
translated: Also practicing the pledges

original: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig bsrung ba la mkha' 'gro ma brgyad kyis bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig bsrung ba la mkha' 'gro ma brgyad kyis bsrung ba'o //
translated: means the eight ḍākinīs protect the one who guards the pledges.

original: de lta bu'i bdud 'joms pa'i mkha' 'gro ma brgyad bshad nas shes rab ye shes kyi dam tshig bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de lta bu'i bdud 'joms pa'i mkha' 'gro ma brgyad bshad nas shes rab ye shes kyi dam tshig bshad pa ni /
translated: Having explained the eight ḍākinīs who conquer such māras, the pledge of the gnosis of the wisdom consort is stated:🔽Union with other goddesses

original: lha mo gzhan dang kun sbyor ba //🔽zhes bya ba smos te ;
analyzed: lha mo gzhan dang kun sbyor ba //🔽zhes bya ba smos te ;
translated: means

original: dang po rnam bshad kyi dam tshig bzhi smos pa ni lha mo gzhan ni dbang bskur ba'o //🔽de dag dang kun du sbyor ba ni bsnyen sgrub ma byas par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: dang po rnam bshad kyi dam tshig bzhi smos pa ni lha mo gzhan ni dbang bskur ba'o // de dag dang kun du sbyor ba ni bsnyen sgrub ma byas par sbyor ba'o //
translated: The first four pledges mentioned are the four pledges of the goddess.

original: dam tshig dang ni mi ldan par //
analyzed: dam tshig dang ni mi ldan par //
translated: To unite with her without having performed the familiarization and attainment is to unite with her without empowerment.🔽To enjoy a knowledge woman without being pledged

original: rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang // zhes bshad pas dbang mi bskur ba dang snyoms par mi sbyar ba dang / 'dod chags par 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang // zhes bshad pas dbang mi bskur ba dang snyoms par mi sbyar ba dang / 'dod chags par 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means not to enjoy union without empowerment.

original: dbang bskur ba yin yang rang bzhin brgyad cu dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba yin yang rang bzhin brgyad cu dang ldan pa'o //
translated: To be attached to desire means to be attached to desire even though one has received empowerment.

original: gnyis med ces bya ba ni gzung 'dzin gnyis dang bral ba'i gnyis med du shes pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis med ces bya ba ni gzung 'dzin gnyis dang bral ba'i gnyis med du shes pa'o //
translated: To know nonduality means to know nonduality free from the duality of subject and object.

original: gzugs med ces bya ba ni dga' bral du song @404a * //
analyzed: gzugs med ces bya ba ni dga' bral du song @404a * //
translated: To be formless means to be beyond the bliss of separation from desire.

original: ba'o // de las bzlog pa yongs gcod bshad pa ni /
analyzed: ba'o // de las bzlog pa yongs gcod bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the exclusion of the opposite of these is as follows.

original: dam tshig spyod pa spyad pa dang // zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang ldan pa la spyod pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig spyod pa spyad pa dang // zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang ldan pa la spyod pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: To practice the conduct of the pledges means to practice union with one who has the pledges.

original: bud med dbang phyug shin tu sbyor //
analyzed: bud med dbang phyug shin tu sbyor //
translated: The woman is the powerful union.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'o //
translated: This is free from the eighty natural [ideas].

original: tshangs par spyod dang de bzhin gzhi //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod dang de bzhin gzhi //
translated: The pure conduct and the basis.

original: zhes bya ba ni gzung 'dzin dang bral ba'i 'od gsal ba zag pa med pa bsrung bas na gzhi'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gzung 'dzin dang bral ba'i 'od gsal ba zag pa med pa bsrung bas na gzhi'o //
translated: This is the clear light free from subject and object, the basis because it is protected.

original: khro med rgyun gyis kun spyod pa //
analyzed: khro med rgyun gyis kun spyod pa //
translated: The conduct of the absence of anger.

original: zhes bya ba ni dga' bral du mi 'gro ba'i bsrung ba'i kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dga' bral du mi 'gro ba'i bsrung ba'i kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: This is the conduct of the protection of the absence of the departure of joy.

original: 'di brgyad dam tshig kun spyod yin //
analyzed: 'di brgyad dam tshig kun spyod yin //
translated: These eight are the conduct of the commitments.

original: zhes bya ba ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig go //
translated: This is the commitment of the wisdom-intuition initiation.

original: de sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams kyi dam tshig tu shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams kyi dam tshig tu shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be known as the commitment of those who abide in the practice of that.

original: de ltar dam tshig bshad nas //
analyzed: de ltar dam tshig bshad nas //
translated: Having explained the commitments in that way,

original: rgyud rnams kun gyi thun mong ste //
analyzed: rgyud rnams kun gyi thun mong ste //
translated: The common [practice] of all tantras.

original: zhes bya ba ni pho nya'i gtsang sbra dngos bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pho nya'i gtsang sbra dngos bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is the explanation of the actual purity of the messenger.

original: stong pa nyid mngon sum du rtogs pa 'di spyod pa dang bya ba dang gnyis ka'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mngon sum du thun mong du snang ba yin pas gnod pa byed pa'i gtan tshigs med par gzhom par mi bya zhing gdags par mi bya ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid mngon sum du rtogs pa 'di spyod pa dang bya ba dang gnyis ka'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mngon sum du thun mong du snang ba yin pas gnod pa byed pa'i gtan tshigs med par gzhom par mi bya zhing gdags par mi bya ba'o //
translated: This direct realization of emptiness is the direct perception of the yogis of both action and performance, and it is a common appearance, so it should not be destroyed or designated without a reason that is a refutation.

original: de ji ltar bsgom zhe na /🔽dad pa nyid kyis blang bya yi //
analyzed: de ji ltar bsgom zhe na / dad pa nyid kyis blang bya yi //
translated: How is it cultivated?

original: zhes bya bas te /
analyzed: zhes bya bas te /
translated: It is to be accepted through faith alone.

original: nam mkha'i rgyu dang tshogs pa las bde ba rtog pa med pa'i nges pa'i shes pa 'dren pas gus par blang ba'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rgyu dang tshogs pa las bde ba rtog pa med pa'i nges pa'i shes pa 'dren pas gus par blang ba'o //
translated: It is to be accepted with respect by the ascertainment that bliss is drawn from the cause of space and the assembly without conception.

original: mig gis mthong ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lag pas ma yin no //
analyzed: mig gis mthong ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lag pas ma yin no //
translated: It is not by the eye, ear, nose, tongue, or hand.

original: gsang ba 'di ni ma bstan cing //
analyzed: gsang ba 'di ni ma bstan cing //
translated: This secret is not to be taught.

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni grol ba'i lam pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni grol ba'i lam pa la mi gnas /
translated: This is not to abide on the path of liberation.

original: lus kyi bar gyis chos kyi phyag rgya las dbang thob pa yin yang /
analyzed: lus kyi bar gyis chos kyi phyag rgya las dbang thob pa yin yang /
translated: Even though one has obtained empowerment from the dharma mudra with the body,

original: reg bya rdo rje ma'i gsang ba 'di ma bstan cing rab tu sbas pa yin na ci'i phyir grol ba'i lam pa la mi bstan zhe na /
analyzed: reg bya rdo rje ma'i gsang ba 'di ma bstan cing rab tu sbas pa yin na ci'i phyir grol ba'i lam pa la mi bstan zhe na /
translated: If this secret of the Vajra Touch is not taught and is well hidden, why is it not taught to the path of liberation?

original: blo ldan mthe'u chung bskyod par ni //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: blo ldan mthe'u chung bskyod par ni // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The wise one should move the little finger.

original: blo ldan ni chags pa'i lam pa'o //
analyzed: blo ldan ni chags pa'i lam pa'o //
translated: The wise one is the one on the path of passion.

original: mthe chung bskyod pa ni rtsa tha ma'i sgo sprad pa'o //
analyzed: mthe chung bskyod pa ni rtsa tha ma'i sgo sprad pa'o //
translated: Moving the little finger is the union of the door of the last channel.

original: pho nya mo rnams yang dag gnas //
analyzed: pho nya mo rnams yang dag gnas //
translated: The messengers are perfectly situated.

original: zhes bya ba ni dung can dang / padma can dang ri dags can rnams las kyi phyag rgyar yang dag par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dung can dang / padma can dang ri dags can rnams las kyi phyag rgyar yang dag par gnas pa'o //
translated: The conch-bearer, the lotus-bearer, and the deer-bearer are perfectly situated as the karma consort.

original: de ltar thabs bshad nas zhar la bskyed rdzogs gnyis ka'i rgyu'i @404b rgyud bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar thabs bshad nas zhar la bskyed rdzogs gnyis ka'i rgyu'i @404b rgyud bshad pa ni /
translated: Having explained the method in that way, the explanation of the cause of both the creation and completion stages is the context:

original: dag dang ma dag 'dres pa ste //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: dag dang ma dag 'dres pa ste // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Pure, impure, and mixed.

original: dag pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: dag pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: Pure is the meditation of the creation stage.

original: ma dag pa ni bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga la longs spyod pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: ma dag pa ni bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga la longs spyod pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: Impure is the meditation of the completion stage, which is the enjoyment of the five amṛtas.

original: 'dres pa ni bskyed rdzogs gnyis ka bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: 'dres pa ni bskyed rdzogs gnyis ka bsgom pa'o //
translated: The mixed is the cultivation of both the creation and completion stages.

original: de'i ming gi rnam grangs ni /
analyzed: de'i ming gi rnam grangs ni /
translated: The synonyms of that are

original: mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang gsal byed ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang gsal byed ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: pleasing, pure, and illuminating.

original: yon tan dang ldan pa'i ming gsum mo //
analyzed: yon tan dang ldan pa'i ming gsum mo //
translated: These are the three names endowed with good qualities.

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the twenty-sixth chapter.

original: // / de ltar le'u dang po'i 'bras bu dang rgyu dang thabs rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas bshad nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u dang po'i 'bras bu dang rgyu dang thabs rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the result, cause, and method in the first chapter,

original: da ni sbyor ba dang / dngos gzhi dang / mjug rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas bshad par bzhed nas /
analyzed: da ni sbyor ba dang / dngos gzhi dang / mjug rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas bshad par bzhed nas /
translated: now, wishing to explain the three topics of the preparation, main subject, and conclusion,

original: de nas rnal 'byor spyod pa brtul zhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽rnal 'byor pa ni gtsang sbra gsum bsgom pa'o //🔽spyod pa ni gtsang sbra rnam pa gsum gyis so //
analyzed: de nas rnal 'byor spyod pa brtul zhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / rnal 'byor pa ni gtsang sbra gsum bsgom pa'o // spyod pa ni gtsang sbra rnam pa gsum gyis so //
translated: it says, “Then, the yogic conduct is the vow,” and so on.🔽The yogic practitioner is the cultivation of the three purities.🔽The conduct is the three types of purity.

original: brtul zhugs ni gtsang sbra gsum ni dngos gzhi'o //
analyzed: brtul zhugs ni gtsang sbra gsum ni dngos gzhi'o //
translated: The vow is the three purities.

original: sbyor ba ni mchod par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni mchod par shes par bya'o //
translated: The preparation should be understood as the worship.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa la yang spyod pa dang brtul zhugs yod na rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang khyad par ci yod ce na /🔽pho nya mo rnams rab sgrub byed //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa la yang spyod pa dang brtul zhugs yod na rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang khyad par ci yod ce na / pho nya mo rnams rab sgrub byed //
translated: If there is conduct and discipline in the stage of generation, what is the difference from the stage of completion?🔽The hero who practices with a heroine

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: is the best of adepts.

original: phyag rgya bzhi dang byang chub sems 'bab pa'i bde ba'i dbang po dang / bde ba bskyed pa'i bag chags rgyu'i rkyen dang / slob dpon gyi gdams ngag dran par byed pa mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen las bsam gtan gyi sdom pa rnam shes dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa ye shes skyes pas rab sgrub byed ces bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi dang byang chub sems 'bab pa'i bde ba'i dbang po dang / bde ba bskyed pa'i bag chags rgyu'i rkyen dang / slob dpon gyi gdams ngag dran par byed pa mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen las bsam gtan gyi sdom pa rnam shes dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa ye shes skyes pas rab sgrub byed ces bya'o //
translated: The four seals, the faculty of bliss from the descent of bodhicitta, the causal condition of the latent tendencies that generate bliss, and the immediately preceding condition of recalling the master’s instructions, are the best of adepts because the meditative absorption vow, consciousness, and the wisdom vow, immaculate, are generated.

original: myur du 'grub ces bya ba ni mngon sum du rtogs par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: myur du 'grub ces bya ba ni mngon sum du rtogs par byed pa yin te /
translated: “Swiftly accomplished” means that it is the cause of direct realization.

original: 'bras bu yod ces bya ba yid //
analyzed: 'bras bu yod ces bya ba yid //
translated: “It has a result” is the mind.

original: ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is said, “It has a result.”

original: pho nya rnams kyis tshigs thams cad shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gtsang sbra gsum la sbyor ba dang / dngos gzhi dang mjug gsum du phye ba ni tshig thams cad do //
analyzed: pho nya rnams kyis tshigs thams cad shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gtsang sbra gsum la sbyor ba dang / dngos gzhi dang mjug gsum du phye ba ni tshig thams cad do //
translated: All the words means that one should divide the three: the preparation, the actual practice, and the conclusion.

original: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa la dang po mchod pa bstan nas /🔽yul dang yul du nyi bar song //
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa la dang po mchod pa bstan nas / yul dang yul du nyi bar song //
translated: Having explained that in brief, in the extensive explanation, after first teaching the worship,

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: it is said,🔽having gone to the various places,

original: gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhir rnal @405a * //
analyzed: gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhir rnal @405a * //
translated: the yogi should go to the twenty-four places

original: 'byor pa de rab tu song zhing sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: 'byor pa de rab tu song zhing sgrub pa'o //
translated: and practice.

original: kha cig ni rgyud bla ma las bshad pa'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi 'khor lo spyod par sgom pa yin la de'i yan lag tu gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhir rgyu zhing rnal 'byor ma 'tshol ba yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: kha cig ni rgyud bla ma las bshad pa'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi 'khor lo spyod par sgom pa yin la de'i yan lag tu gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhir rgyu zhing rnal 'byor ma 'tshol ba yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say that this is the practice of the wheel of the qualities of training explained in the Uttaratantra, and that as a branch of that, one should go to the twenty-four places and seek out the yoginis.

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not correct.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i tshe phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa bya'o zhes kha sbyor las gsungs pa dang 'gal ba dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro las kyang /🔽bcos ma'i bsgom pa spang bar bya //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i tshe phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa bya'o zhes kha sbyor las gsungs pa dang 'gal ba dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro las kyang / bcos ma'i bsgom pa spang bar bya //
translated: The Vajradaka also says:🔽Abandon fabricated meditation.

original: bcos pa'i bzlas pa 'ang spang bar bya //
analyzed: bcos pa'i bzlas pa 'ang spang bar bya //
translated: Abandon fabricated recitation.

original: de la sogs pa'i bcos ma kun //
analyzed: de la sogs pa'i bcos ma kun //
translated: All such fabrications

original: rnal ma'i sbyor ba'i tshul la min //
analyzed: rnal ma'i sbyor ba'i tshul la min //
translated: are not the way of natural union.

original: zhes gsungs pas sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi lhar bskyed pa'i don med do //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi lhar bskyed pa'i don med do //
translated: Thus, there is no point in generating the qualities of training as deities.

original: 'o na yul der ci'i phyir rgyu snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na yul der ci'i phyir rgyu snyam na /
translated: Well, why is it called a “cause”?

original: pho nya'i gzugs su mtshon pa yin //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: pho nya'i gzugs su mtshon pa yin // zhes gsungs te /
translated: It is a symbol in the form of a messenger.

original: kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod lam gyis mtshon pa dang brda gsum gyis mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod lam gyis mtshon pa dang brda gsum gyis mtshon pa'o //
translated: It is a symbol by means of color, shape, and deportment, and a symbol by means of the three symbolic gestures.

original: de shes pas 'bras bu ci 'grub ce na /
analyzed: de shes pas 'bras bu ci 'grub ce na /
translated: What is the result of knowing that?

original: pho nya ral gri'i so 'dra zhing //
analyzed: pho nya ral gri'i so 'dra zhing //
translated: The messenger is like the edge of a sword.

original: dag byed bsod nams 'phel byed yin //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: dag byed bsod nams 'phel byed yin // zhes gsungs te /
translated: The purifier is the increase of merit.

original: dag byed ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: dag byed ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'o //
translated: The purifier is the freedom from the eighty natural instincts.

original: bsod nams 'phel ba ni lhag mthong gi ye shes skyes pa'o //
analyzed: bsod nams 'phel ba ni lhag mthong gi ye shes skyes pa'o //
translated: The increase of merit is the arising of the gnosis of insight.

original: de bzhin pho nya legs 'dres pas //
analyzed: de bzhin pho nya legs 'dres pas //
translated: Likewise, the messenger is well-mixed.

original: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin ni dpe ral gri'i so 'dra ba la bsnyegs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin ni dpe ral gri'i so 'dra ba la bsnyegs so //
translated: Likewise means that one should pursue the example of the sword's edge.

original: ral gri 'dra ba su zhe na /
analyzed: ral gri 'dra ba su zhe na /
translated: What is like a sword?

original: pho nya legs 'dres pas zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: pho nya legs 'dres pas zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The messenger is well-mixed.

original: thams cad las ni sems bsdus nas //
analyzed: thams cad las ni sems bsdus nas //
translated: Having withdrawn the mind from everything,

original: nang gi bdag nyid dbye byed pas //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid dbye byed pas //
translated: the inner self is differentiated.

original: gnas pa'i lus kyi reg bya ni //
analyzed: gnas pa'i lus kyi reg bya ni //
translated: The tactile sensation of the abiding body

original: thog ma'i blo ni lhan skyes yin //
analyzed: thog ma'i blo ni lhan skyes yin //
translated: is the innate mind at the beginning.

original: zhes bshad pas rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba la legs par 'dres pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bshad pas rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba la legs par 'dres pa'o //
translated: Thus, the freedom from the eighty natural instincts is well-mixed.

original: sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob //
analyzed: sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob //
translated: The adept attains power.

original: ces bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi dang sbyor ba las dngos grub gsum thob pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi dang sbyor ba las dngos grub gsum thob pa'o //
translated: This means that the three powers are attained from the practice of the four seals.

original: goms pa mi dgos sam zhe na /
analyzed: goms pa mi dgos sam zhe na /
translated: Is there no need for practice?

original: bzlas brjod bsam gtan med par yang //
analyzed: bzlas brjod bsam gtan med par yang //
translated: Even without repetition and meditation,

original: myur ba nyid du grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: myur ba nyid du grub par 'gyur //
translated: one will quickly achieve.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: dper na bkru sman gyi tshogs pa las nad 'byin pa bzhin du bzlas brjod dang bsam @405b gtan med kyang /
analyzed: dper na bkru sman gyi tshogs pa las nad 'byin pa bzhin du bzlas brjod dang bsam @405b gtan med kyang /
translated: For example, just as a collection of medicinal ingredients removes a disease, even without repetition and meditation,

original: rnam shes dang ye shes ni rgyu tshogs pa las skye'o //
analyzed: rnam shes dang ye shes ni rgyu tshogs pa las skye'o //
translated: consciousness and wisdom are born from the collection of causes.

original: de ltar shes pa'i 'bras bu dang / bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu dang / myur ba'i 'bras bu gsum bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar shes pa'i 'bras bu dang / bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu dang / myur ba'i 'bras bu gsum bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the result of knowledge, the result of practice, and the quick result,

original: thabs bshad pa ni /
analyzed: thabs bshad pa ni /
translated: the method is explained.

original: sngags dang phyag rgyas sgrub pa po //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgyas sgrub pa po //
translated: The practitioner with mantra and mudra

original: mchod pa nyid la rab tu 'jug / ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: mchod pa nyid la rab tu 'jug / ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: engages in the very worship.

original: sngags ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lus la lha dgod pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dbugs 'byung 'jug 'khor ba'o //
analyzed: sngags ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lus la lha dgod pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dbugs 'byung 'jug 'khor ba'o //
translated: Mantra is the placement of deities in the body of the creation stage and the exhalation and inhalation of the completion stage.

original: phyag rgya ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyag mtshan dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyag rgya bzhi'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyag mtshan dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyag rgya bzhi'o //
translated: Mudra is the hand implements of the creation stage and the four mudras of the completion stage.

original: mchod pa ni gtsang sbra gsum gyi sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa ni gtsang sbra gsum gyi sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa'o //
translated: Worship is the various kinds of application of the three purities and the engagement in the maturation of the fruit.

original: de las gzhan pa'i mchod med de //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i mchod med de //
translated: There is no worship other than that.

original: zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgrub pa'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgrub pa'i mchod pa'o //
translated: This is the worship of the path of serenity and insight.

original: de ltar bstan bcos rnam nges yin //
analyzed: de ltar bstan bcos rnam nges yin //
translated: Thus it is the treatise Ascertainment.

original: zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba ste mngon sum gyi lam bstan pa'i snying po yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba ste mngon sum gyi lam bstan pa'i snying po yin no //
translated: This is the conclusion, the essence of the teaching of the path of direct knowledge.

original: rgyal po ni mi la khur gyis dge slong seng ge ma bsad kyi bar du mtshan nyid kyi theg pa la yang mngon sum gyi lam yod pa yin pa las bsad nas bstan pa'i snying po nub pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyal po ni mi la khur gyis dge slong seng ge ma bsad kyi bar du mtshan nyid kyi theg pa la yang mngon sum gyi lam yod pa yin pa las bsad nas bstan pa'i snying po nub pa yin no //
translated: In the vehicle of dialectics, the path of direct knowledge exists until the king kills the bhiksuni Sengema.

original: gsang sngags kyi theg pa la ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam mngon sum yod pas bstan pa'i snying po ma nub pa yin no //
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi theg pa la ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam mngon sum yod pas bstan pa'i snying po ma nub pa yin no //
translated: But in the vehicle of mantra, the path of direct knowledge of serenity and insight exists, so the essence of the teaching has not disappeared.

original: 'o na bstan pa'i snying po yod na /
analyzed: 'o na bstan pa'i snying po yod na /
translated: Well, if the essence of the teaching exists,

original: gsang pa 'dus pa'i le'u bcu bdun pa las mar me mdzad nas 'od srungs kyi bar du ma gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: gsang pa 'dus pa'i le'u bcu bdun pa las mar me mdzad nas 'od srungs kyi bar du ma gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of the statement in the seventeenth chapter of the Guhyasamaja Tantra that the Buddha did not teach from Dipamkara to Kashyapa?

original: las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor ma rtogs pa la dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor ma rtogs pa la dgongs pa yin no //
translated: It is intended for the yoga practitioner who is a beginner and has not realized the meaning.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni dus thams cad du mngon sum gyi lam gyis chos kyi rdzogs par longs spyod cing nyams su myong ba'i phyir dge slong ma seng ge'i rnam par thar pa las sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni dus thams cad du mngon sum gyi lam gyis chos kyi rdzogs par longs spyod cing nyams su myong ba'i phyir dge slong ma seng ge'i rnam par thar pa las sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag
translated: Because the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas always enjoy and experience the Dharma with the path of direct perception, the bhikshuni Siṃha’s liberation says that the Bodhisattvas of the tenth stage pay homage to the Buddhas.

original: na rdo rje mthu bo che rdo rje rgyan zhes bya ba rdo rje theg pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: na rdo rje mthu bo che rdo rje rgyan zhes bya ba rdo rje theg pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro zhes gsungs so //
translated: The great powerful Vajrapani turned the wheel of the Dharma of the Vajra Vehicle called the Vajra Ornament.

original: pho nya dang sbyar ba'i mchod pa bshad nas /
analyzed: pho nya dang sbyar ba'i mchod pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the worship that is applied to the messenger,

original: rnam par nyed pa dga' bral gyi gnyen por spyod pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par nyed pa dga' bral gyi gnyen por spyod pa bstan pa ni /
translated: the practice that is the antidote to the depression of being separated from the joy is taught.

original: pho nya'i lam la dga' bas kyang //
analyzed: pho nya'i lam la dga' bas kyang //
translated: Even one who delights in the path of the messenger

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.🔽The adept on the path of passion,

original: chags @406a * //
analyzed: chags @406a * //
translated: striving for power,

original: pa'i lam pa'i sgrub pa po ni dngos grub brtson zhes bya ba ni dga' bral du 'gro ba'i dgos pa'i ro mnyam gyi spyod pa sgom pa'o //
analyzed: pa'i lam pa'i sgrub pa po ni dngos grub brtson zhes bya ba ni dga' bral du 'gro ba'i dgos pa'i ro mnyam gyi spyod pa sgom pa'o //
translated: is the cultivation of the conduct of equal taste, which is the purpose of going to the freedom of joy.

original: de yang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i spyod pa ste //
analyzed: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i spyod pa ste //
translated: The conduct of the gaṇacakra.

original: rig sngags phyag rgyar yang dag ldan //
analyzed: rig sngags phyag rgyar yang dag ldan //
translated: Endowed with the seal of the knowledge mantra,

original: zhes bya ba nas zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i sngags dang lag pa g-yas g-yon dgang gzar dang blugs gzar du byas pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas bdud rtsi lnga'i kha zas la rtag tu spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i sngags dang lag pa g-yas g-yon dgang gzar dang blugs gzar du byas pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas bdud rtsi lnga'i kha zas la rtag tu spyad par bya'o //
translated: one should always enjoy the food of the five nectars, endowed with the mantra of pacification, increase, and so on, and the seals of the right and left hands as the ladle and the pan.

original: kha zas 'ba' zhig dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed dam zhe na /
analyzed: kha zas 'ba' zhig dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed dam zhe na /
translated: If one asks, “Is it only food that is used in the gaṇacakra?”🔽The adept,

original: sgrub pa po ni legs pa ru //🔽mnyam par gzhag pas rigs rnams ni //
analyzed: sgrub pa po ni legs pa ru // mnyam par gzhag pas rigs rnams ni //
translated: in a good place,🔽should enjoy all the families

original: kun la nye bar spyad bya zhing //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: kun la nye bar spyad bya zhing //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: in equipoise.

original: legs par mnyam par gzhag pa ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: legs par mnyam par gzhag pa ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'o //
translated: Well-equipoised is free from the eighty inherent natures.

original: rigs rnams kun ni gzugs nas reg bya'i bar du yul lnga dga' ba bzhi nye bar longs spyod cing rtog pa med pa'i shes pa skyes pa'i dus su bza' ba ma yin zhes blang dor du mi brtag go //
analyzed: rigs rnams kun ni gzugs nas reg bya'i bar du yul lnga dga' ba bzhi nye bar longs spyod cing rtog pa med pa'i shes pa skyes pa'i dus su bza' ba ma yin zhes blang dor du mi brtag go //
translated: All the families are the five objects from form to touch, which are enjoyed without conceptualization, when the knowledge that is free from conceptualization arises. At that time, one should not consider them as things to be eaten or avoided.

original: de ltar tshogs kyi spyod pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar tshogs kyi spyod pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the conduct of the gaṇacakra,

original: zhi ba'i btung ba bshad pa ni don dam du ni dbyer med ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhi ba'i btung ba bshad pa ni don dam du ni dbyer med ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: now, the explanation of the drink of peace is stated: ultimately, indivisible.

original: don dam bde ba rtog pa med pa sgyu ma lta bu shes pa ni dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: don dam bde ba rtog pa med pa sgyu ma lta bu shes pa ni dbyer med pa'o //
translated: The ultimate, non-conceptual bliss, which is illusory-like knowledge, is indivisible.

original: pho nya mo gnyis grub par zhes bya ba ni gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes kyi sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: pho nya mo gnyis grub par zhes bya ba ni gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes kyi sgrub pa'o //
translated: The two accomplished messengers refers to the secret and wisdom knowledge initiations.

original: dngos grub cho ga la spyod pa ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su /
analyzed: dngos grub cho ga la spyod pa ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su /
translated: The conduct in the rite of spiritual powers is at the time of the secret initiation.

original: pho nya gcig pu kho na yin //
analyzed: pho nya gcig pu kho na yin //
translated: The messenger is the sole one.

original: zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga 'byin pa'i yum mo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga 'byin pa'i yum mo //
translated: The messenger who bestows the five nectars is the mother.

original: rab bdag nyid ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: rab bdag nyid ces bya ba ni /
translated: The best is to do it yourself.🔽

original: mchog gi dngos grub dang po'o //
analyzed: mchog gi dngos grub dang po'o //
translated: The best of the best is the first power.

original: dngos grub ni /
analyzed: dngos grub ni /
translated: The power is🔽the proximity of the accomplishment.

original: sgrub pa dag kyang nye ba dang // zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi dngos grub dang nye ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa dag kyang nye ba dang // zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi dngos grub dang nye ba'o //
translated: This is the proximity of the mundane power.

original: bla ma'i brgyud pas thob pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / yid skyob par byed pa'i sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bla ma'i brgyud pas thob pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / yid skyob par byed pa'i sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa /
translated: The consecration is the consecration obtained from the lineage of gurus, and the mantra is the concentration that protects the mind.

original: pho nya rnam gsum yang dag bshad //
analyzed: pho nya rnam gsum yang dag bshad //
translated: The three messengers are explained.🔽Thus, having explained the conduct of the consecration of the secret, the conduct of the purification of the messenger is explained.

original: ces bya'o // de ltar gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i spyod pa bshad nas pho nya'i gtsang sbra'i spyod pa bshad pa ni dang po'i pho nya'i rnal 'byor ba'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
analyzed: ces bya'o // de ltar gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i spyod pa bshad nas pho nya'i gtsang sbra'i spyod pa bshad pa ni dang po'i pho nya'i rnal 'byor ba'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
translated: The characteristics of the messenger of the first yoga are taught.

original: phyag rgya legs sbyor dang tshul ni //
analyzed: phyag rgya legs sbyor dang tshul ni //
translated: The mudra is well-joined, and the method

original: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i rtog pa med pa'i ngang tshul can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i rtog pa med pa'i ngang tshul can no //
translated: is the one who has the nature of being free from the eighty natural concepts.

original: chags med stong dang zhes bya ba @406b ni chags med ni bde ba'i ro myang ba'o //
analyzed: chags med stong dang zhes bya ba @406b ni chags med ni bde ba'i ro myang ba'o //
translated: The emptiness of non-attachment is the taste of bliss.

original: tshul khrims ldan zhes bya ba ni sdom pa gsum la gnas pa'o //🔽ye shes rgyu skyes yang dag rdzogs //
analyzed: tshul khrims ldan zhes bya ba ni sdom pa gsum la gnas pa'o // ye shes rgyu skyes yang dag rdzogs //
translated: The phrase endowed with morality means to abide in the three vows.

original: zhes bya ba ni skye ba snga mar goms par byas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni skye ba snga mar goms par byas pa'o //
translated: The phrase arisen from the cause of intuition means that [the vow] is cultivated in a previous life.🔽The phrase the mind is elevated within means that

original: sems kyi bdag nyid nang bar langs //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems kyi bdag nyid nang bar langs // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: the mind is elevated within the body.

original: dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang / lhan cig skyes dga' las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang / lhan cig skyes dga' las 'das pa'o //
translated: The phrase gone beyond joy, supreme joy, and innate joy means that🔽the mind is elevated within the body.🔽The phrase the clear light is cultivated means that

original: 'od gsal ba ni bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba ni bsgom pa'o //
translated: the clear light is cultivated in the body.

original: kha cig ni thun bzhi dang por mal nas langs nas /
analyzed: kha cig ni thun bzhi dang por mal nas langs nas /
translated: Some say that the four periods are the time of rising from bed,🔽the time of meditating on the creation stage,

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: and so forth.

original: de ni skabs ma yin pas brjod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: de ni skabs ma yin pas brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: But that is not the proper context, so it should not be mentioned.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i spyod pa ni bskyed rim sgom pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i spyod pa ni bskyed rim sgom pa ma yin zhing /
translated: The conduct of the perfection stage is not the meditation of the creation stage.

original: bskyed pa rim pa la ni thun bzhir lha'i skur bsgom pa ni dngos gzhi yin pas 'brel ba med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bskyed pa rim pa la ni thun bzhir lha'i skur bsgom pa ni dngos gzhi yin pas 'brel ba med pa ma yin no //
translated: But since the meditation on the deity's body in four periods is the main practice of the creation stage, it is not unrelated.

original: de ltar rten gyi gang zag bshad nas thabs bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar rten gyi gang zag bshad nas thabs bstan pa ni /
translated: Having explained the person who is the basis, the teaching of the method is as follows.

original: lus kyi bya ba kun byas nas //
analyzed: lus kyi bya ba kun byas nas //
translated: Having performed all physical actions,

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyud kyi rim pa 'khor lo bzhi dang rtsa gsum bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyud kyi rim pa 'khor lo bzhi dang rtsa gsum bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is the explanation of the four wheels and three channels, the stages of the tantra.

original: lus la shin tu mtshon cha ni //
analyzed: lus la shin tu mtshon cha ni //
translated: The body is well-armed.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi rim pa rlung me'i drod can nyi shu rtsa bzhi bsregs pas na mtshon cha'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi rim pa rlung me'i drod can nyi shu rtsa bzhi bsregs pas na mtshon cha'o //
translated: This is the stage of mantra. The body is armed with the twenty-four winds that have the heat of fire.

original: lus la gnas pa kun du spyad //
analyzed: lus la gnas pa kun du spyad //
translated: The body is well-endowed.

original: ces bya ba ni ye shes kyi rim pa la 'khor lo bzhi las byang chub kyi sems bab pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni ye shes kyi rim pa la 'khor lo bzhi las byang chub kyi sems bab pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of wisdom. The bodhicitta descends from the four wheels.

original: dag byed byas pa'i lus kyang ni //
analyzed: dag byed byas pa'i lus kyang ni //
translated: The body is purified.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the stage of the secret.

original: gsang ba'i rim pa dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang lhan cig skyes dga' ba las 'das pa'i dag byed reg bya'i stong pa nyid sgom pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i rim pa dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang lhan cig skyes dga' ba las 'das pa'i dag byed reg bya'i stong pa nyid sgom pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the tactile object is meditated upon, the purifier that transcends the joys, the supreme joy, and the connate joy.

original: rtag tu sngags ni brjod par bya //
analyzed: rtag tu sngags ni brjod par bya //
translated: The mantra is always recited.

original: zhes bya ba ni srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud pas dag byed kyi lus brtan par gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud pas dag byed kyi lus brtan par gyur ba'o //
translated: This is the stage of the pledge. The body is stabilized by the purifier, the life-force entering the avadhūti.

original: rnal 'byor sngags rnams nges bsten zhing //
analyzed: rnal 'byor sngags rnams nges bsten zhing //
translated: The yogi relies on the mantras.

original: zhes bya ba ni tshogs drug gi rlung aa na ha'i nang du gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tshogs drug gi rlung aa na ha'i nang du gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is the wind of the six collections, which is taught in the Anāhata.

original: mtshon cha rnams ni bsgom mi bya //
analyzed: mtshon cha rnams ni bsgom mi bya //
translated: One should not meditate on weapons.

original: zhes pa ni dbang po drug gi rtsa las byang chub kyi sems phab nas bde ba rtog med skyes pa ni mtshon cha yin la /
analyzed: zhes pa ni dbang po drug gi rtsa las byang chub kyi sems phab nas bde ba rtog med skyes pa ni mtshon cha yin la /
translated: The bodhicitta descending from the nāḍīs of the six sense organs and the arising of nonconceptual bliss is an “weapon.”

original: de la goms par mi bya ba ni lus dang yid bde ba dga' bral du mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de la goms par mi bya ba ni lus dang yid bde ba dga' bral du mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “One should not meditate on that” means that one should not become habituated to the bliss of the body and mind, which is free of joy.

original: bram ze sa ra pa'i lugs kyis thig le gnyis shor ba dang gnyis lus pa'i mtshams su bde ba stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i shes pa bskyed par 'dod mod kyi /🔽mtshon cha rnams ni @407a * //
analyzed: bram ze sa ra pa'i lugs kyis thig le gnyis shor ba dang gnyis lus pa'i mtshams su bde ba stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i shes pa bskyed par 'dod mod kyi / mtshon cha rnams ni @407a * //
translated: The system of the brahmin Saraha asserts that the consciousness that realizes the emptiness of bliss arises between the two emissions of the two bindus.

original: bsgom mi bya //
analyzed: bsgom mi bya //
translated: “One should not meditate on weapons”

original: zhes gsungs pas mchog gi rgyud dang 'gal ba yin no //🔽dam tshig can la khro mi bya //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas mchog gi rgyud dang 'gal ba yin no // dam tshig can la khro mi bya //
translated: is contradictory to the highest tantras.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should not be angry with those who have samaya.

original: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob nas bde ba rtog pa zag med kyi rten yin par shes bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas mi gtsang ba'i rdzas yin par smod pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas mi tshangs par spyod pa yin no zhes sems pa'i blos las kyi phyag rgya la smod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob nas bde ba rtog pa zag med kyi rten yin par shes bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas mi gtsang ba'i rdzas yin par smod pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas mi tshangs par spyod pa yin no zhes sems pa'i blos las kyi phyag rgya la smod par mi bya'o //
translated: Having obtained the wisdom-knowledge initiation, one should not, with a mind that thinks, “I am a receptacle of impurities” in accordance with the śrāvaka vehicle, or “I am engaging in impure conduct” in accordance with the world, disparage the karma consort, knowing that bliss is the support of the uncontaminated realization of wisdom.

original: mngon par brtson las 'da' mi bya //
analyzed: mngon par brtson las 'da' mi bya //
translated: Do not transgress through great effort.

original: zhes bya ba ni kha sbyor las gsungs pa bzhin du rgyu'i tshogs pa la brten pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kha sbyor las gsungs pa bzhin du rgyu'i tshogs pa la brten pa'o //
translated: This means relying on the assembly of causes, as stated in the Cakrasaṃvara Tantra.

original: de dang lhan cig bde bar bya //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig bde bar bya //
translated: Be blissful with her.

original: zhes bya ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i lha mo bde ba dang bsam gtan gyi bde ba sgom pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i lha mo bde ba dang bsam gtan gyi bde ba sgom pa'o //
translated: This means meditating on the bliss of the gaṇacakra and the bliss of meditative concentration.🔽For the sake of liberation.

original: grol ba'i don dang zhes bya ba ni dag byed kyi lha mo dang zag med kyi bde ba sgom pa'o //
analyzed: grol ba'i don dang zhes bya ba ni dag byed kyi lha mo dang zag med kyi bde ba sgom pa'o //
translated: This means meditating on the purifying goddess and uncontaminated bliss.

original: de'i don dang zhes bya ba ni de dang grol ba'i dam tshig spyad pa'o //🔽'di dang lhan cig pa spyod bya //
analyzed: de'i don dang zhes bya ba ni de dang grol ba'i dam tshig spyad pa'o // 'di dang lhan cig pa spyod bya //
translated: The meaning of that is the practice of the pledge of liberation with that.

original: zhes bya ba ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ltar bltas pa tsam gyis ma yin pa dang / 'phrul dga' ltar dgod pa dang / dga' ldan lar lag bcangs dang / mtshe ma ltar 'khyud bsam yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ltar bltas pa tsam gyis ma yin pa dang / 'phrul dga' ltar dgod pa dang / dga' ldan lar lag bcangs dang / mtshe ma ltar 'khyud bsam yin pa'o //
translated: One should practice with this means that one should not be like the gods of Controlling Others' Emanations, who merely look at each other, or like the gods of the Heaven of Delighting in Emanations, who laugh at each other, or like the gods of the Heaven of Joy, who hold hands, or like the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, who embrace each other.

original: s'a lu sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bzhin du bsam gtan gyi rgyu'i tshogs pa bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: s'a lu sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bzhin du bsam gtan gyi rgyu'i tshogs pa bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should generate the accumulation of the causes of meditative concentration, like the gods of the Heaven of the Four Great Kings, who have intercourse.

original: de ltar rnam par nyed pa dga' bral gyi gnyen po spyod pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par nyed pa dga' bral gyi gnyen po spyod pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the practice that is the antidote to the separation from joy that is the subsiding of the bliss of melting,

original: dngos gzhi la mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i dus su phyi'i lus ngag gi brtul zhugs bshad pa ni /
analyzed: dngos gzhi la mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i dus su phyi'i lus ngag gi brtul zhugs bshad pa ni /
translated: now, in the main practice, the external conduct of body and speech at the time of being free from the characteristics is explained:

original: mtshan mo rtag par nam mkha'i gos //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: mtshan mo rtag par nam mkha'i gos // zhes smos te /
translated: Always at night, the sky-cloth.

original: rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: This is free from conceptuality.

original: gnag dang dmar bar rtag gyur bya //
analyzed: gnag dang dmar bar rtag gyur bya //
translated: Always black and red.

original: zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu'i he ru ka dang yum rdo rje phag mo'i kha dog go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu'i he ru ka dang yum rdo rje phag mo'i kha dog go //
translated: This is the color of the resultant Heruka and of the mother Vajravarahi.

original: srog chags yan lag las byung gyon //
analyzed: srog chags yan lag las byung gyon //
translated: He wears the skin of beings with limbs.

original: zhes bya ba ni glang po che dang stag gi pags pa'i gzugs brnyan bgos pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni glang po che dang stag gi pags pa'i gzugs brnyan bgos pa'o //
translated: This means that he wears the skins of elephants and tigers.

original: bde ba 'dod pas bde thob 'gyur //
analyzed: bde ba 'dod pas bde thob 'gyur //
translated: He attains bliss by desiring bliss.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba lus bde 'dod pa dang / phyi'i brtul zhugs he ru ka'i cha byad kyis bde ba grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba lus bde 'dod pa dang / phyi'i brtul zhugs he ru ka'i cha byad kyis bde ba grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: He attains the bliss of concentration by desiring the bliss of the body, and the bliss of the external observance by the appearance of Heruka.

original: mchod phyir thogs ni yongs spangs gtsang //
analyzed: mchod phyir thogs ni yongs spangs gtsang //
translated: He is pure by abandoning the sacred thread.

original: zhes bya @407b ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyag rgya lnga las gcig med kyang lus ngag yid gsum gyi zhen pa spangs pa ni yongs spangs gtsang ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya @407b ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyag rgya lnga las gcig med kyang lus ngag yid gsum gyi zhen pa spangs pa ni yongs spangs gtsang ba'o //
translated: This means that he is pure by abandoning the attachment of body, speech, and mind, even though he lacks one of the five symbolic ornaments of the creation stage.

original: shr'i he ru ka'i byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: shr'i he ru ka'i byin gyis brlabs //
translated: He is blessed by the Heruka of the east.

original: zhes bya ba ni shr'i ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shr'i ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The east is nondual intuition.

original: he ni rgyu dang bral bas na lus stong par byin gyis brlabs so //
analyzed: he ni rgyu dang bral bas na lus stong par byin gyis brlabs so //
translated: Since he is free from cause, he is blessed as the empty body.

original: ru ni bkod pa dang bral bas na ngag mtshan ma med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: ru ni bkod pa dang bral bas na ngag mtshan ma med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: Ru is the consecration of speech as signless, because it is free from arrangement.

original: ka ni gang du mi gnas pas na sems smon pa med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: ka ni gang du mi gnas pas na sems smon pa med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: Ka is the consecration of mind as wishless, because it does not abide anywhere.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i mchod phyir thogs spangs nas phyi'i brtul zhugs la rgyan med pa yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i mchod phyir thogs spangs nas phyi'i brtul zhugs la rgyan med pa yin nam zhe na /
translated: If one has abandoned the external observances of the creation stage, such as the ornaments, is one without ornaments in the conduct of the outer observances?

original: phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The five symbolic ornaments are

original: spyi gtsug gi nor bu dang / rna rgyan dang / mgul rgyan dang / lag bdub  dang / tshangs skud rnams ni rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: spyi gtsug gi nor bu dang / rna rgyan dang / mgul rgyan dang / lag bdub  dang / tshangs skud rnams ni rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The ornaments of bone are the crown jewel, earrings, necklace, bracelets, and sacred thread.

original: dus kun du ni yang dag spyad //
analyzed: dus kun du ni yang dag spyad //
translated: One should always practice

original: ces bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa ltar dngos gzhi la ting nge 'dzin bsgoms nas ldang ba'i tshe sdud pa ma yin pa dngos dang rjes kyi spyod lam thams cad du phyag rgya lnga'i rgyan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa ltar dngos gzhi la ting nge 'dzin bsgoms nas ldang ba'i tshe sdud pa ma yin pa dngos dang rjes kyi spyod lam thams cad du phyag rgya lnga'i rgyan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: As in the creation stage, after meditating on the main subject of the concentration, when one arises, one should be adorned with the ornaments of the five symbolic ornaments in all conduct, both in actuality and in post-equipoise.

original: phyag rgya lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five symbolic ornaments?

original: mgul rgyan gdu bu rna rgyan dang // spyi bo nor bus rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: mgul rgyan gdu bu rna rgyan dang // spyi bo nor bus rnam par brgyan //
translated: He is adorned with a necklace, bracelets, earrings, and a crest jewel.

original: mchod phyir thogs dang rnam pa lnga //🔽thal ba dang drug go //
analyzed: mchod phyir thogs dang rnam pa lnga // thal ba dang drug go //
translated: He is adorned with the five bone ornaments.🔽He is adorned with the sixth, the ash.

original: dus kun du ni rnam par gnas //
analyzed: dus kun du ni rnam par gnas //
translated: He always abides.

original: zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo gcig pu dang rgyal tshab kyi spyod pa'i tshe spyod lam rnam pa bzhi'i dus thams cad du rnam par gnas pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo gcig pu dang rgyal tshab kyi spyod pa'i tshe spyod lam rnam pa bzhi'i dus thams cad du rnam par gnas pa ste /
translated: This is the abiding in the four postures at all times when practicing the conduct of the sole hero and the regent.

original: tshogs drug gi rtog pa med pa mtshon par byed pa'i phyag rgya drug rnam par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs drug gi rtog pa med pa mtshon par byed pa'i phyag rgya drug rnam par gnas pa'o //
translated: The six mudras that illustrate the absence of concepts of the sixfold collection always abide.

original: las dang po pas ji ltar bya zhe na /🔽mtshan mo brtan par gsal bya zhing //
analyzed: las dang po pas ji ltar bya zhe na / mtshan mo brtan par gsal bya zhing //
translated: What should a beginner do?🔽One should be clear at night,

original: nyin mo gsang ba nyid du bya //
analyzed: nyin mo gsang ba nyid du bya //
translated: and secret during the day.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /🔽mtshan mo tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus su gsal bar bya zhing /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te / mtshan mo tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus su gsal bar bya zhing /
translated: This is stated.🔽One should be clear at night, during the gaṇacakra.

original: nyin par 'jig rten pa la gsang ba'i tshe spa bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: nyin par 'jig rten pa la gsang ba'i tshe spa bar bya ba yin no //
translated: One should be secret during the day, when one is in the world.

original: de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang zhi ba'i btung ba dang pho nya'i gtsang sbra gsum gyi lus dang ngag gi phyi'i brtul zhugs bshad nas gtsang sbra gsum gyi sems kyi gsang ba'i brtul zhugs ni /
analyzed: de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang zhi ba'i btung ba dang pho nya'i gtsang sbra gsum gyi lus dang ngag gi phyi'i brtul zhugs bshad nas gtsang sbra gsum gyi sems kyi gsang ba'i brtul zhugs ni /
translated: Thus, having explained the external observances of body and speech, the three of the feast circle, the drink of peace, and the purity of the messenger, the secret observances of mind are the three purities.

original: tha dad ye shes shin tu sbas //🔽zhes bya ba ni tshogs @408a * //
analyzed: tha dad ye shes shin tu sbas // zhes bya ba ni tshogs @408a * //
translated: The knowledge of difference is well hidden.

original: kyi 'khor lo la ma dad par shes pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la tha dad par snang ba dang / zhi ba'i btung ba la gzung 'dzin gnyis su snang ba dang / pho nya'i gtsang sbra la gzung 'dzin gnyis su tha dad par snang ba'i shes pa nus par byas pa ni sbas pa'o //
analyzed: kyi 'khor lo la ma dad par shes pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la tha dad par snang ba dang / zhi ba'i btung ba la gzung 'dzin gnyis su snang ba dang / pho nya'i gtsang sbra la gzung 'dzin gnyis su tha dad par snang ba'i shes pa nus par byas pa ni sbas pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of difference is the knowledge of the five objects of desire appearing as different in the feast circle, the knowledge of the appearance of the duality of subject and object in the drink of peace, and the knowledge of the appearance of the duality of subject and object as different in the purity of the messenger.

original: rab tu zhi zhing dbang po dul //
analyzed: rab tu zhi zhing dbang po dul //
translated: Very peaceful and with subdued senses.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam shes la rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral bas na rab tu zhi ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam shes la rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral bas na rab tu zhi ba'o //
translated: Since consciousness is free from the eighty natural [ideas], it is very peaceful.

original: ye shes la gzung 'dzin gnyis dang bral bas na dbang po thul ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes la gzung 'dzin gnyis dang bral bas na dbang po thul ba'o //
translated: Since pristine consciousness is free from the duality of subject and object, the senses are subdued.

original: gtsang sbra gsum du shes bya zhing //
analyzed: gtsang sbra gsum du shes bya zhing //
translated: One should know the three purities.

original: zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dag pas na gtsang sbra ste ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dag pas na gtsang sbra ste ;
translated: Since it is pure of the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience, it is pure.

original: de yang / zhi gnas stong pas dben pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang dngos por 'dzin pas dben pa dang / stong pa'i ye shes gnyis su snang bas bden pas na rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: de yang / zhi gnas stong pas dben pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang dngos por 'dzin pas dben pa dang / stong pa'i ye shes gnyis su snang bas bden pas na rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: Moreover, it has three aspects: the emptiness of the peace of śamatha, the emptiness of the illusion-like that is free from grasping at things, and the emptiness of the wisdom of the two appearances.

original: rang gi rgyun bzhin rnam par gnas //
analyzed: rang gi rgyun bzhin rnam par gnas //
translated: It abides like its own continuum.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang ni shes pa rtog pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang ni shes pa rtog pa med pa'o //
translated: Its own is the nonconceptual consciousness.

original: rgyun ni dang po rtog pa med pa bzhin phyis kyang rgyun yang rnam par gnas pa na rgyun bzhin rnam par gnas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rgyun ni dang po rtog pa med pa bzhin phyis kyang rgyun yang rnam par gnas pa na rgyun bzhin rnam par gnas zhes bya'o //
translated: Since its continuum is like the nonconceptuality at the beginning, it is said that “it abides like its own continuum” since it abides in a continuum.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: As such, it is said:

original: don dam snying po las /🔽mngon sum rgyun ni bsrings pa la /
analyzed: don dam snying po las / mngon sum rgyun ni bsrings pa la /
translated: In the Essence of the Ultimate,🔽It is explained that meditation

original: sgom pa zhes ni bshad pa yin //🔽zhes bshad do //
analyzed: sgom pa zhes ni bshad pa yin // zhes bshad do //
translated: Is the extension of the continuum of direct perception.

original: rigs dang rigs min dor mi blta //
analyzed: rigs dang rigs min dor mi blta //
translated: One should not look to abandon the possible and impossible.

original: zhes bya ba ni shes pa rtog pa med pa skyes pa'i tshe'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shes pa rtog pa med pa skyes pa'i tshe'o //
translated: This is when the non-conceptual consciousness arises.

original: sems pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral bas rigs yid du 'ong ba dang / rigs min yin du mi 'ong ba dang btang snyoms su mi 'dzin pas na dor ni blta zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sems pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral bas rigs yid du 'ong ba dang / rigs min yin du mi 'ong ba dang btang snyoms su mi 'dzin pas na dor ni blta zhes bya'o //
translated: Since the mind is free from conceptual thought, it does not hold as desirable the right family, nor as undesirable the wrong family, nor as indifferent the neutral family. Therefore, it is said, “the view is cast off.”

original: shes pa rtog pa med pa gsang ba'i brtul zhugs la phyag rgya rnam pa lngar 'dzin pa yod dam zhe na /
analyzed: shes pa rtog pa med pa gsang ba'i brtul zhugs la phyag rgya rnam pa lngar 'dzin pa yod dam zhe na /
translated: When the non-conceptual consciousness is in the secret conduct, is there a holding of the five types of seals?

original: spyi gtsug la sogs bcings pa yang //
analyzed: spyi gtsug la sogs bcings pa yang //
translated: The binding of the crown and so forth

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: is also not to be done.

original: gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa ni blang dor gyi rnam par rtog pa yang med do //
analyzed: gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa ni blang dor gyi rnam par rtog pa yang med do //
translated: There is also no conceptual thought of accepting or rejecting clothing, the five seals, and so forth.

original: de ltar na phyag rgya drug ni rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar na phyag rgya drug ni rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, the six seals become three types.

original: rigs drug gi rang bzhin du phyag rgya drug bsgom pa bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / mtshan bcas kyi rdzogs rim gyi dus su tshogs drug gi shes pa rtog pa med par dran par byed pa'i phyag rgya drug dang dngos gzhi mtshan med kyi rdzogs rim gsang ba'i brtul zhugs kyi tshe phyag rgya drug rnam par @408b bsgom pa yin no //
analyzed: rigs drug gi rang bzhin du phyag rgya drug bsgom pa bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / mtshan bcas kyi rdzogs rim gyi dus su tshogs drug gi shes pa rtog pa med par dran par byed pa'i phyag rgya drug dang dngos gzhi mtshan med kyi rdzogs rim gsang ba'i brtul zhugs kyi tshe phyag rgya drug rnam par @408b bsgom pa yin no //
translated: At the time of the secret conduct of the main practice of the signless completion stage, the six seals are cultivated.

original: de yang mkha' 'gro las /
analyzed: de yang mkha' 'gro las /
translated: The Ḍākinī says:

original: rnal ma'i lam ni brten nas ni //🔽thams cad byas kyang rnam par grol //
analyzed: rnal ma'i lam ni brten nas ni // thams cad byas kyang rnam par grol //
translated: Relying on the path of naturalness,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: even though everything is done, one is liberated.

original: gtsang sbra gsum po de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: gtsang sbra gsum po de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three purities?

original: pho nya dang zla ba dang snod gcig tu za ba'o //
analyzed: pho nya dang zla ba dang snod gcig tu za ba'o //
translated: The messenger, the moon, and eating from the same vessel.

original: reg bya rdo rje ma la stong pa nyid mngon sum gyis bsgoms pas na dang po yin no //
analyzed: reg bya rdo rje ma la stong pa nyid mngon sum gyis bsgoms pas na dang po yin no //
translated: The first is the seal of touch, Vajra Touch, because one meditates on emptiness directly.

original: zla ba la ni ro rdo rje ma la sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pas na bar ma yin no //
analyzed: zla ba la ni ro rdo rje ma la sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pas na bar ma yin no //
translated: The second is the seal of taste, Vajra Taste, because one realizes the moon as illusion-like.

original: snod gcig tu za ba ni zhi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin skyes pas na tha ma yin no //
analyzed: snod gcig tu za ba ni zhi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin skyes pas na tha ma yin no //
translated: Eating from a single vessel is the last, because the meditative concentration of serenity has arisen.

original: de la aindra bh'u ti'i zhal snga nas zla ba tshes pa lta bu'i man ngag dang / skar khung lta bu'i man ngag dang seng ge'i phru gu lta bu'i man ngag dang zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de la aindra bh'u ti'i zhal snga nas zla ba tshes pa lta bu'i man ngag dang / skar khung lta bu'i man ngag dang seng ge'i phru gu lta bu'i man ngag dang zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Indrabhūti’s oral instructions are the instruction on the waxing moon, the instruction on the skylight, and the instruction on the lion cub.

original: de la zla ba tshes pa ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed pa'i tshe bde bar mtshon nas tshes bco lnga'i zla ba bzhin du chos thams cad la bsam gtan gyi bde ba rgyas par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de la zla ba tshes pa ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed pa'i tshe bde bar mtshon nas tshes bco lnga'i zla ba bzhin du chos thams cad la bsam gtan gyi bde ba rgyas par byed pa yin no //
translated: The waxing moon: When you are performing the gaṇacakra feast of the five sense objects, you imagine that you are experiencing bliss, and then you spread the bliss of meditative concentration to all phenomena, like the fifteenth-day moon.

original: skar khung lta bu ni ro rdo rje ma la sgyu ma lta bu'i gseng brtol nas phyi rol gyi nam mkha' bzhin du chos thams cad la sgyu ma lta bu bzhin du rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: skar khung lta bu ni ro rdo rje ma la sgyu ma lta bu'i gseng brtol nas phyi rol gyi nam mkha' bzhin du chos thams cad la sgyu ma lta bu bzhin du rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The skylight: You make a hole in the illusory woman’s vagina, and then you realize that all phenomena are like an illusion, like the sky outside.

original: seng ge'i phru gu lta bu ni reg bya rdo rje ma la stong pa nyid mngon sum du rtogs nas seng ge'i yan lag ma snad pas ri dags thams cad skrag par byed pa bzhin du chos thams cad kyi stong nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: seng ge'i phru gu lta bu ni reg bya rdo rje ma la stong pa nyid mngon sum du rtogs nas seng ge'i yan lag ma snad pas ri dags thams cad skrag par byed pa bzhin du chos thams cad kyi stong nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Like lion cubs, having realized the emptiness of the tactile vajra woman, they will realize the emptiness of all phenomena, like a lion who, without damaging his limbs, terrifies all deer.

original: de yang rgyal po'i yul las /
analyzed: de yang rgyal po'i yul las /
translated: The Rājāvavādaka Sūtra says:

original: reg bya'i stong pa nyid rtogs na chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: reg bya'i stong pa nyid rtogs na chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: “If you realize the emptiness of the tactile, you will realize the emptiness of all phenomena.”

original: lha mo dpal mo'i zhal nas gtsang sbra gsum ni lcags kyu lta bu'i man ngag yin te /
analyzed: lha mo dpal mo'i zhal nas gtsang sbra gsum ni lcags kyu lta bu'i man ngag yin te /
translated: The goddess Śrīmātṛkā says: “The three purities are the hook-like intimate instruction.

original: de yang khams gsum 'khor ba ni rgya mtsho lta bu yin la /
analyzed: de yang khams gsum 'khor ba ni rgya mtsho lta bu yin la /
translated: The three realms of saṃsāra are like an ocean.

original: bde ba rtog pa med pa ni nya lta bu yin la /
analyzed: bde ba rtog pa med pa ni nya lta bu yin la /
translated: Nonconceptual bliss is like a fish.

original: gtsang sbra rnam pa gsum gyi lcags kyus bzung nas bde ba chen po'i skams la 'byin pa yin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: gtsang sbra rnam pa gsum gyi lcags kyus bzung nas bde ba chen po'i skams la 'byin pa yin no zhes bshad do //
translated: Having caught it with the hook of the three purities, it is brought out onto the dry land of great bliss.”

original: padma rdo rje'i zhal snga nas gtsang sbra gsum ni nam mkha' lta bu'i man ngag yin te /
analyzed: padma rdo rje'i zhal snga nas gtsang sbra gsum ni nam mkha' lta bu'i man ngag yin te /
translated: The lotus-vajra face-to-face disciple says: The three purities are the instruction of space.

original: rtsa gsum gyi sna gsang ba'i rdo rje nor bu bha gar song ba la /🔽g-yon pa la la n'a'i rlung gis ni dga' bral gyi bde ba nyams nas khams gsum 'khor ba'i rnam par rtog pa bskyed pa dang / g-yas pas ra sa n'a'i rlung gis gyen du bzlog pa'i tshe byang @409a * //
analyzed: rtsa gsum gyi sna gsang ba'i rdo rje nor bu bha gar song ba la / g-yon pa la la n'a'i rlung gis ni dga' bral gyi bde ba nyams nas khams gsum 'khor ba'i rnam par rtog pa bskyed pa dang / g-yas pas ra sa n'a'i rlung gis gyen du bzlog pa'i tshe byang @409a * //
translated: The three channels go to the secret vajra gem bhaga.🔽The left channel, lalanā, generates the bliss of separation from joy and the concepts of the three realms of cyclic existence.

original: chub kyi sems ra sa n'ar bcug pas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug k'a ma tvatta dang / tshe 'phel ba be sha tva tra zhes bya par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chub kyi sems ra sa n'ar bcug pas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug k'a ma tvatta dang / tshe 'phel ba be sha tva tra zhes bya par 'gyur ro //
translated: When the right channel, rasanā, reverses the wind, the bodhicitta enters the rasanā, and one becomes the lord of desire, Kāmatattva, and the increaser of life, Vetasattvatra.

original: dbus ma aa wa dh'u t'i'i rlung gis byang chub kyi sems aa wa dh'u t'ir chud pa'i tshe /
analyzed: dbus ma aa wa dh'u t'i'i rlung gis byang chub kyi sems aa wa dh'u t'ir chud pa'i tshe /
translated: When the bodhicitta enters the central channel, avadhūtī,

original: mi zad pa bsam gtan gyi bde ba nee ranydza na tvatta zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi zad pa bsam gtan gyi bde ba nee ranydza na tvatta zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: through the wind of the central channel, avadhūtī, one becomes the inexhaustible bliss of meditative concentration, Nairanjanatattva.

original: de la stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pas zag pa med pa'i bde ba bar ma tvatta zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pas zag pa med pa'i bde ba bar ma tvatta zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And it is explained:

original: de yang / dkar dmar gos ni bsal nas kyang //
analyzed: de yang / dkar dmar gos ni bsal nas kyang //
translated: Having removed the red and white coverings,

original: srog ni nam mkhar chud gyur na //
analyzed: srog ni nam mkhar chud gyur na //
translated: the life-force enters into space,

original: bde ba mi zad rtog med pa /
analyzed: bde ba mi zad rtog med pa /
translated: and the inexhaustible, nonconceptual bliss

original: bde ba chen por skye bar 'gyur //🔽zhes bshad do //
analyzed: bde ba chen por skye bar 'gyur // zhes bshad do //
translated: is born as great bliss.

original: dkar dmar gos ni g-yas g-yon gyi rtsa la byang chub kyi sems gnas pa'i chags pas chags bral spangs pa'i bsam gtan gyi bde ba skyes nas bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab nas dbus ma yang 'dor ba yin no //
analyzed: dkar dmar gos ni g-yas g-yon gyi rtsa la byang chub kyi sems gnas pa'i chags pas chags bral spangs pa'i bsam gtan gyi bde ba skyes nas bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab nas dbus ma yang 'dor ba yin no //
translated: The “red and white coverings” are the right and left channels. The bodhicitta that is present there is abandoned through passion, and the bliss of concentration free from passion is born. Having been sealed by great bliss, the middle channel is also abandoned.

original: de yang mnyam sbyor las /
analyzed: de yang mnyam sbyor las /
translated: And the Union with Buddha states:

original: chags pa ma yin chags bral min //
analyzed: chags pa ma yin chags bral min //
translated: Not passionate, not free from passion,

original: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so // zhes gsungs so //
translated: it is not even observed in the middle.

original: rin chen rdo rje'i zhal snga nas /
analyzed: rin chen rdo rje'i zhal snga nas /
translated: Ratnavajra states:

original: aa sa ma sa ma zhes bya ba ste mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi man ngag yin gyi de yang mngon sum gyi shes pa la nges pa 'dren pa bla ma'i man ngag gis byas nas mngon sum gzhan las nges par 'gyur te //
analyzed: aa sa ma sa ma zhes bya ba ste mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi man ngag yin gyi de yang mngon sum gyi shes pa la nges pa 'dren pa bla ma'i man ngag gis byas nas mngon sum gzhan las nges par 'gyur te //
translated: Moreover, having induced certainty in the cognition of direct perception through the instruction of the guru, one should ascertain it through another direct perception.

original: gang la rtog pa med pa skyes kyang snang la nges pas na so sor brtags min ma yin no //
analyzed: gang la rtog pa med pa skyes kyang snang la nges pas na so sor brtags min ma yin no //
translated: Since it is ascertained by the appearance of what is born without thought, it is not non-analytical.

original: gzung dang 'dzin par nges par lhag pa ni chos dang gang zag bdag gi rang bzhin gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin par nges par lhag pa ni chos dang gang zag bdag gi rang bzhin gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: The excess of the ascertainment of apprehended object and apprehending subject is the nature of the self of phenomena and the person, which is the nature of apprehended object and apprehending subject.

original: mngon sum bde ba rtog pa med par skyes pa la nges pa'i shes pa 'dren nus pa ni mngon sum rang las nges pa yin la /
analyzed: mngon sum bde ba rtog pa med par skyes pa la nges pa'i shes pa 'dren nus pa ni mngon sum rang las nges pa yin la /
translated: The ability to induce certainty in the bliss of direct perception that is born without thought is the certainty of direct perception from itself.

original: gang la ma nges pa des gtsang sbra rnam pa gsum gyis rgyu'i tshogs pas bde ba rtog pa med pa'i nges pa 'dren pa'am bla ma'i mngon sum gyi gzhan don gyis nges pa 'dren pa ni mngon sum gzhan las nges pa yin no //
analyzed: gang la ma nges pa des gtsang sbra rnam pa gsum gyis rgyu'i tshogs pas bde ba rtog pa med pa'i nges pa 'dren pa'am bla ma'i mngon sum gyi gzhan don gyis nges pa 'dren pa ni mngon sum gzhan las nges pa yin no //
translated: One who is not certain about this, by the assemblage of causes of the three purities, induces certainty in non-conceptual bliss, or induces certainty in the benefit of others by the direct perception of the guru. This is certainty from another direct perception.

original: de yang bde ba rtog med rang dang gzhan las nges pa'i bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la stong pa nyid rang dang gzhan las nges pa 'dren pa ni sa dang @409b po'i ye shes yin no //
analyzed: de yang bde ba rtog med rang dang gzhan las nges pa'i bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la stong pa nyid rang dang gzhan las nges pa 'dren pa ni sa dang @409b po'i ye shes yin no //
translated: Moreover, the wisdom of the first stage induces emptiness from self and other in the concentration of meditative stabilization of non-conceptual bliss from self and other.

original: de ltar na gtsang sbra 'di dag rab tu bskyangs pas /
analyzed: de ltar na gtsang sbra 'di dag rab tu bskyangs pas /
translated: Thus, by thoroughly cultivating these purities,

original: gtsang ma dag pa'i rim thob nas //
analyzed: gtsang ma dag pa'i rim thob nas //
translated: one attains the stage of pure purity.

original: zhes bya ste zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum du skyes pa'o //🔽dngos grub gang las 'byung mi 'gyur //
analyzed: zhes bya ste zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum du skyes pa'o // dngos grub gang las 'byung mi 'gyur //
translated: This is the direct arising of śamatha and vipaśyanā.🔽From what will accomplishments not arise?

original: zhes bya ba ni ci'i phyir 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ci'i phyir 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: What is the reason that they will not arise?

original: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will certainly arise.

original: de ltar gsang ba'i brtul zhugs dang phan yon dang po bstan nas phan yon gnyis pa rgyud thams cad kyi dngos grub 'grub pa ni de nyid bsdus pa dang bde mchog dang thams cad gsang ba dang dpal mchog dang po dang rdo rje 'jigs byed las gsungs pa'i
analyzed: de ltar gsang ba'i brtul zhugs dang phan yon dang po bstan nas phan yon gnyis pa rgyud thams cad kyi dngos grub 'grub pa ni de nyid bsdus pa dang bde mchog dang thams cad gsang ba dang dpal mchog dang po dang rdo rje 'jigs byed las gsungs pa'i
