analyzed: 'di ni dug thams cad 'jigs par byed pa mngon spyod mi bzad sbyin sreg 'di gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is the teaching of this fierce rite of burnt offering that destroys all poisons.

original: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Having thus taught in brief, the extensive explanation is stated with “thus” and so forth.

original: khyi ni zhe sdang 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: khyi ni zhe sdang 'joms pa'o //
translated: The dog is the destroyer of hatred.

original: phag ni gti mug 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: phag ni gti mug 'joms pa'o //
translated: The pig is the destroyer of delusion.

original: zangs kyi gtsug phud can ni khyim bya ste 'dod chags 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: zangs kyi gtsug phud can ni khyim bya ste 'dod chags 'joms pa'o //

original: gang gi dkyil 'khor la zhen pa la mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: gang gi dkyil 'khor la zhen pa la mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba gsungs so //
translated: The one who is attached to that maṇḍala is said to be the one for whom the rite of assault is performed.

original: de ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: bza' ba ste /
analyzed: bza' ba ste /
translated: It is the oblation.

original: dang gi sbyin sreg dang / sbyin sreg ste phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg dang gtor ma rnams @420b bya'o //
analyzed: dang gi sbyin sreg dang / sbyin sreg ste phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg dang gtor ma rnams @420b bya'o //
translated: The external oblation and bali offerings are to be performed.

original: ma lus lus pa med grub po //
analyzed: ma lus lus pa med grub po //
translated: One will accomplish everything without exception.

original: zhes bya ba ni las bcu gnyis grub pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni las bcu gnyis grub pa'o //
translated: This is the accomplishment of the twelve deeds.

original: rgyal srid thams cad bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal srid thams cad bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa'o //
translated: All kingship is indicated.

original: de ltar sreg rdzas bshad nas de'i snod bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar sreg rdzas bshad nas de'i snod bshad pa ni /
translated: Having thus explained the burnt substances, the explanation of the vessel is

original: dung dang nya phyis ju tig ste //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: dung dang nya phyis ju tig ste //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: conch, oyster shell, and pearl.

original: dung la sogs pa gsum char yang las dang nyon mongs pa dang khu khrag gi rgyu las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: dung la sogs pa gsum char yang las dang nyon mongs pa dang khu khrag gi rgyu las byung ba yin no //
translated: The three, conch and so on, arise from the causes of karma, afflictions, and semen and blood.

original: bsod nams kyi las kyi rgyu rkyen las byung ba'i chos kyi ye shes kyi lus can mi'i thod pas sreg rdzas kyi snod du byas kyang mkhas pa rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams su yang smod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsod nams kyi las kyi rgyu rkyen las byung ba'i chos kyi ye shes kyi lus can mi'i thod pas sreg rdzas kyi snod du byas kyang mkhas pa rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams su yang smod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The body of the wisdom of Dharma, which arises from the causes and conditions of meritorious karma, is the vessel of the burning substances, even if it is a human skull.

original: de ltar snod bshad nas bdag nyid lhar bskyed pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar snod bshad nas bdag nyid lhar bskyed pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: Having explained the vessel in that way, what is the generation of oneself as a deity?

original: dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can //🔽zhes bya ba pa smos te /
analyzed: dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can // zhes bya ba pa smos te /
translated: The hero with a garland of skulls.

original: sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin gyi cod pan can /
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin gyi cod pan can /
translated: He is said to have a crown with the nature of the five buddhas.

original: zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas //
analyzed: zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas //
translated: Adorned with a half-moon.

original: zhes bya ba ni zla ba phyed pa'i rtags can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zla ba phyed pa'i rtags can no //
translated: He has the sign of a half-moon.

original: dpa' bo dbang phyug yin par bshad //
analyzed: dpa' bo dbang phyug yin par bshad //
translated: The hero is said to be Mahesvara.

original: ces bya ba ni mkha' 'gro ma kun spyod las /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni mkha' 'gro ma kun spyod las /
translated: In the conduct of the dakinis, it is said:

original: sprul pa las byung dpa' bo rnams //
analyzed: sprul pa las byung dpa' bo rnams //
translated: The heroes who arise from emanation

original: yan lag drug cus sems kyis sprul //
analyzed: yan lag drug cus sems kyis sprul //
translated: are emanated by the mind with sixty branches.

original: dag pa'i chos kyi sprul pa rnams //
analyzed: dag pa'i chos kyi sprul pa rnams //
translated: The emanations of the pure Dharma

original: phag mo'i gzugs su bstan pa yin //
analyzed: phag mo'i gzugs su bstan pa yin //
translated: are taught in the form of a sow.

original: zhes bshad pas dpal he ru ka las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bshad pas dpal he ru ka las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should meditate on the circle of the mandala together with the glorious Heruka.

original: phyag rgya bshad pa ni /
analyzed: phyag rgya bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the seals:🔽The five signs are taught.

original: brda lnga po ni bstan pa dag / ces bya ba ni sor mo g-yon pa lnga thabs lngar bsgom pa dang / g-yas pa lnga lha mo lngar bsgom pa'i brda lnga'o //
analyzed: brda lnga po ni bstan pa dag / ces bya ba ni sor mo g-yon pa lnga thabs lngar bsgom pa dang / g-yas pa lnga lha mo lngar bsgom pa'i brda lnga'o //
translated: The five signs are the meditation on the five fingers of the left hand as the five methods and the meditation on the five fingers of the right hand as the five goddesses.

original: de yang de ltar dgod snyam na /
analyzed: de yang de ltar dgod snyam na /
translated: If one thinks that it is thus arranged,

original: sgrub pa po yi lag g-yon gyi //
analyzed: sgrub pa po yi lag g-yon gyi //
translated: the practitioner's left hand

original: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa'i sgra ni dpa' bo drug gi gnas yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa'i sgra ni dpa' bo drug gi gnas yin te /
translated: is the abode of the six heroes.

original: shes rab dang thabs ro gcig tu byas nas brda rnams la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs ro gcig tu byas nas brda rnams la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: Having made wisdom and method into one taste, one should engage in the signs.

original: brda de yang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang gtor ma dang phyi nang gi sbyin sreg dang dbang bskur ba'i dus su lta'i rang bzhin du bskyed nas brda zhes bya ba lus kyi tha snyad de /

translated: That sign is also called gesture because it is generated in the nature of the assembly, the sacrificial cake, the outer and inner burnt offerings, and the consecration, and it is the convention of the body.

original: lag pa'i phyag rgya'i bya ba la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: lag pa'i phyag rgya'i bya ba la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
translated: It is the engagement in the activity of the gesture of the hand.

original: ci'i phyir g-yon pa la gtso bo dang dgod snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir g-yon pa la gtso bo dang dgod snyam pa la /
translated: Why is the left the principal and the right the secondary?

original: khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba //
analyzed: khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba //
translated: The moving and unmoving of the three realms

original: 'gro kun g-yon las byung ba yin //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'gro kun g-yon las byung ba yin // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: all come from the left.

original: lus po phyed ni shes rab tshogs kyi dbyibs las byung ba yin /
analyzed: lus po phyed ni shes rab tshogs kyi dbyibs las byung ba yin /
translated: The left half of the body comes from the form of the assembly of wisdom.

original: g-yas pa ni thabs las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: g-yas pa ni thabs las byung ba yin no //
translated: The right comes from method.

original: @421a * // ci'i phyir g-yon pa shes rab yin zhe na /
analyzed: @421a * // ci'i phyir g-yon pa shes rab yin zhe na /
translated: Why is the left wisdom?

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brdar gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brdar gyur pa yin te /
translated: It is the sign of the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: shes rab thams cad thabs dang shes rab gnyis su 'dus par ston pa yin no //
analyzed: shes rab thams cad thabs dang shes rab gnyis su 'dus par ston pa yin no //
translated: It shows that all wisdom is included in the two, method and wisdom.

original: des na g-yon pa'i chos kyi dbyings las snod bcud thams cad 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: des na g-yon pa'i chos kyi dbyings las snod bcud thams cad 'byung ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the entire world and its contents arise from the left, the realm of reality.

original: de yang ji ltar na lha dgod par bya zhe na /🔽mthe bong la rdo rje sems dpa'/
analyzed: de yang ji ltar na lha dgod par bya zhe na / mthe bong la rdo rje sems dpa'/
translated: Moreover, how should one visualize the deities?🔽One should visualize Vajrasattva on the thumb,

original: mdzub mo la rnam par snang mdzad /
analyzed: mdzub mo la rnam par snang mdzad /
translated: Vairocana on the index finger,

original: gung mo la padma gar gyi dbang phyug / srin lag la dpal he ru ka / mthe'u chung la nam mkha'i snying po /
analyzed: gung mo la padma gar gyi dbang phyug / srin lag la dpal he ru ka / mthe'u chung la nam mkha'i snying po /
translated: Padmanarteshvara on the middle finger, Shri Heruka on the ring finger, and Akashagarbha on the little finger.

original: sen mo'i ngos la rta mchog bsgoms la /
analyzed: sen mo'i ngos la rta mchog bsgoms la /

original: lag pa g-yon pa bsgyur byas nas /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa bsgyur byas nas /
translated: Having turned the left hand,

original: dpa' bo 'di rnams 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dpa' bo 'di rnams 'byung ngo //
translated: these heroes arise.

original: lag pa'i mthil shr'i he ru ka / phag mo kun 'dus dag byed pa yin //
analyzed: lag pa'i mthil shr'i he ru ka / phag mo kun 'dus dag byed pa yin //
translated: The hero Shri Heruka in the palm of the hand is the purifier of the gathering of all Vajravarahi.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: lag mthil g-yas g-yon du thabs rnam pa drug dang / shes rab rnam pa drug lag mthil du bkod nas thal mo sbyar bas lus kun dag byed ces bya ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur pa yin no //

translated: Having arranged the six aspects of means and the six aspects of wisdom in the right and left palms, the gesture of the purification of the entire body is formed by joining the palms.

original: rgyab tu rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: rgyab tu rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: Vajradaka is on the back.

original: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i lag pa'i mthil du padma 'dab ma lnga pa'i 'dab ma la mkha' 'gro ma lnga dang / lte ba la gtum mo dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i lag pa'i mthil du padma 'dab ma lnga pa'i 'dab ma la mkha' 'gro ma lnga dang / lte ba la gtum mo dgod par bya'o //
translated: This is the arrangement of the five dakinis on the petals of the five-petaled lotus in the palm of the left hand, and of Candika in the center.

original: de bzhin du lag pa g-yon pa la dpa' bo rnams bkod pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du lag pa g-yon pa la dpa' bo rnams bkod pa ni /
translated: Similarly, the arrangement of the heroes on the left hand is as follows:

original: mdza' ba thams cad 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: mdza' ba thams cad 'dus pa'o //
translated: The gathering of all friends.

original: rin chen rdo rje'i zhal snga nas /
analyzed: rin chen rdo rje'i zhal snga nas /
translated: Ratnavajra says:

original: rgyab tu rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: rgyab tu rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: Vajra dakini on the back.

original: zhes bya ba ni sen mo'i ngos la tsandi ka bkod la sor mo thams cad kyi mdza' ba 'dus pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sen mo'i ngos la tsandi ka bkod la sor mo thams cad kyi mdza' ba 'dus pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: This is the arrangement of Candali on the back of the nail, and the gathering of all friends on all the fingers.

original: cho ga des ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: cho ga des ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: What is done by this rite?

original: de lta'i cho ga'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: de lta'i cho ga'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the yoga of this rite,

original: dpa' bo thams cad mchod par bya //
analyzed: dpa' bo thams cad mchod par bya //
translated: one should worship all the heroes.

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: This is said.

original: nang gi sbyin sreg dang phyi'i sbyin sreg dang / gtor mas mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: nang gi sbyin sreg dang phyi'i sbyin sreg dang / gtor mas mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should worship with inner fire sacrifice, outer fire sacrifice, and bali offerings.

original: sor mo rnam lha'i rang bzhin du bskyed nas 'byung ba rnams ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: sor mo rnam lha'i rang bzhin du bskyed nas 'byung ba rnams ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: Having generated the fingers as the nature of the deities, what is done with the elements?

original: sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad //
analyzed: sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad //
translated: The earth is said to be Locanā.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba lnga lha mo lnga yin par ston zhing /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba lnga lha mo lnga yin par ston zhing /
translated: Thus, it is taught that the five goddesses are the five elements.

original: lha de rnams gang du gshegs su gsol zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: lha de rnams gang du gshegs su gsol zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: To which deities should one request to depart?

original: lag pa gzhal yas khang du byas la mkhas pas gzhal yas khang gi steng rgyab tu gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: lag pa gzhal yas khang du byas la mkhas pas gzhal yas khang gi steng rgyab tu gshegs su gsol //
translated: Having made one’s hands into a celestial mansion, the wise one should request the deities to depart to the back of the celestial mansion.

original: gsang ba 'di ni mi bshad cing //
analyzed: gsang ba 'di ni mi bshad cing //
translated: This secret should not be spoken.

original: zhes bya ba ni @421b lag pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba 'di dbang ma bskur ba la mi bshad cing rdo rje spun ma yin pa la yang gsang ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni @421b lag pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba 'di dbang ma bskur ba la mi bshad cing rdo rje spun ma yin pa la yang gsang ba yin no //
translated: This secret of the hand gesture should not be spoken to one who has not been initiated, and it should be kept secret from one who is not a vajra sibling.

original: 'o na dus nam gyi tshe bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na dus nam gyi tshe bya zhe na /
translated: When, then, should it be done?

original: de ltar bdag nyid dpa' bo rnams //
analyzed: de ltar bdag nyid dpa' bo rnams //
translated: Thus, the heroes themselves

original: lhan cig zas la spyod pa brtsam //
analyzed: lhan cig zas la spyod pa brtsam //
translated: should begin to enjoy food together.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya ba'o //
translated: One should perform the gaṇacakra.

original: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
analyzed: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
translated: The union of all heroes

original: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin //
translated: is the supreme bliss of the dakini web.

original: zhes bya ba ni lag pa'i phyag rgya mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde mchog go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lag pa'i phyag rgya mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde mchog go //
translated: This is the Cakrasaṃvara of the union of the hand gesture.

original: le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /🔽// / de ltar mi rgyu ba'i sbyin sreg gi 'khor lo bshad nas //
analyzed: le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o / // / de ltar mi rgyu ba'i sbyin sreg gi 'khor lo bshad nas //
translated: The explanation of the thirty-first chapter.🔽Having explained the non-moving fire sacrifice,

original: da ni yi dags srog song gi 'khor lo bshad pa ni /
analyzed: da ni yi dags srog song gi 'khor lo bshad pa ni /
translated: now, the explanation of the fire sacrifice of the hungry ghost life-force wheel is as follows.🔽Next, I will explain

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth.

original: gzhan yang ni ro langs kyi sbyin sreg go //
analyzed: gzhan yang ni ro langs kyi sbyin sreg go //
translated: Next is the zombie fire sacrifice.

original: phyi'i sbyin sreg gi spyod pa dang / nang gi sbyin sreg cho ga bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dang / mchod rdzas dang / thab lhar bskyed pa dang / mchod pa dang 'bras bu dngos grub lang ba dang gshegs su gsol ba'o //
analyzed: phyi'i sbyin sreg gi spyod pa dang / nang gi sbyin sreg cho ga bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dang / mchod rdzas dang / thab lhar bskyed pa dang / mchod pa dang 'bras bu dngos grub lang ba dang gshegs su gsol ba'o //
translated: The external fire sacrifice conduct, the internal fire sacrifice, the mandala of the four rites, the offering substances, the generation of the hearth deity, the offerings, the arrival of the siddhi result, and the request for departure.

original: rnam pa gang gis cho ga de shes na myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis cho ga de shes na myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: By what aspect does one know that rite, and quickly attain siddhi?

original: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
translated: Having explained that in brief, the extensive explanation is as follows.

original: sgrub pos sngar bstan rim pa yis //
analyzed: sgrub pos sngar bstan rim pa yis //
translated: The adept, by the previously explained process,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa sreg rdzas dang / snod dang lhar bskyed pa'i phyag rgya'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa sreg rdzas dang / snod dang lhar bskyed pa'i phyag rgya'i rim pa'o //
translated: Chapter thirty-one: The stages of the seals of the substances to be burned, the vessel, and the generation of the deity.

original: phyugs rnams kyi ni 'gugs pa nyid //
analyzed: phyugs rnams kyi ni 'gugs pa nyid //
translated: The summoning of the animals.

original: ces bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'i sreg rdzas kyi steng du kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyugs 'di rnams kyis bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'i sreg rdzas kyi steng du kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyugs 'di rnams kyis bstan par bya'o //
translated: On top of the substances to be burned taught previously, these animals without sin are taught.

original: de la mi'i sha dang / rus sbal dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ce sbyang dang / rta la sogs pa dpa' bo lnga'i sha dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du bsgrub pa'i yan lag yin no //
analyzed: de la mi'i sha dang / rus sbal dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ce sbyang dang / rta la sogs pa dpa' bo lnga'i sha dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du bsgrub pa'i yan lag yin no //
translated: There, the flesh of humans, tortoises, donkeys, camels, hyenas, horses, and so on, the flesh of the five heroes, is a branch of practice in the maṇḍala for the practice of spiritual powers.

original: khyad par gzhan dag kyang yod dam zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par gzhan dag kyang yod dam zhe na /
translated: Are there other distinctions?

original: rigs mchog phyugs zhes bya ste mi sha ni bdud rtsi lnga par gyur pas na mchog go //
analyzed: rigs mchog phyugs zhes bya ste mi sha ni bdud rtsi lnga par gyur pas na mchog go //
translated: The best of the families is called the animal, and since human flesh is the five ambrosias, it is the best.

original: rkang bzhi pa las glang po mchog dang / 'dab chags las dad pa dang / chu la gnas pa dud 'gro las rus sbal dang / gi wang dang bcas pa'i sha la lha rnams gsol bar bzhed pas chu g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: rkang bzhi pa las glang po mchog dang / 'dab chags las dad pa dang / chu la gnas pa dud 'gro las rus sbal dang / gi wang dang bcas pa'i sha la lha rnams gsol bar bzhed pas chu g-yo ba'o //
translated: The best of elephants among the quadrupeds, the faithful among the birds, the tortoise among the animals living in the water, and the flesh together with the essence of the cow, the gods accept.

original: de rnams ni dngos grub sgrub pa'i yan lag tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa rnams la grags pa yin no //
analyzed: de rnams ni dngos grub sgrub pa'i yan lag tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa rnams la grags pa yin no //
translated: These are well known in the supernormal knowledge of the divine eye of the buddhas and bodhisattvas as a branch of the practice for the attainment of power.

original: khva dang chu skyar dang gzhan @422a * //
analyzed: khva dang chu skyar dang gzhan @422a * //
translated: The flesh of the crow, the heron,

original: dang gnyis skyes te khu byug dang / khrung khrung dang / sngags chen po dang / sa ra sa dang / ka dampa la sogs pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sha dang / nang gi sbyin sreg bza' ba dang / gtor ma dang /
analyzed: dang gnyis skyes te khu byug dang / khrung khrung dang / sngags chen po dang / sa ra sa dang / ka dampa la sogs pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sha dang / nang gi sbyin sreg bza' ba dang / gtor ma dang /
translated: the hermaphrodite, the cuckoo, the crane, the great mantra, the sarasa, the kadamba, and so on, is pure flesh, to be eaten in the inner fire sacrifice, the bali offering,

original: phyi rol du sbyin sreg byas nas 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi rol du sbyin sreg byas nas 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the outer fire sacrifice. All desired powers will be attained.

original: de ltar phyi nang gi thun mong gi sbyin sreg bstan nas ro langs kyi khyad par gyi sbyin sreg ga sreg rdzas bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar phyi nang gi thun mong gi sbyin sreg bstan nas ro langs kyi khyad par gyi sbyin sreg ga sreg rdzas bshad pa ni /
translated: Having thus taught the common outer and inner fire offerings, the special fire offering of the zombie is explained.

original: krishna shva na zhes bya ba ni khyi mo shin tu gnag pa lus gang la yang spu dkar po med pa 'o ma dang / ma sha'i 'bras nag po phye mar byas pa dang ldan pa'i thug pa sbyar la tshes bco lnga'i dus sku skar ma rgyal dang gza' phur bu 'dzom pa'i dus su rgyal rigs sam rje'u'i rigs sam bram ze'i rigs sha dkar la sma ra ser ba shing punda r'i
analyzed: krishna shva na zhes bya ba ni khyi mo shin tu gnag pa lus gang la yang spu dkar po med pa 'o ma dang / ma sha'i 'bras nag po phye mar byas pa dang ldan pa'i thug pa sbyar la tshes bco lnga'i dus sku skar ma rgyal dang gza' phur bu 'dzom pa'i dus su rgyal rigs sam rje'u'i rigs sam bram ze'i rigs sha dkar la sma ra ser ba shing punda r'i
translated: The “black bitch” is a bitch who is very black, with no white hair anywhere on her body. Prepare a porridge with her milk and black rice flour. At the time of the fifteenth day, when the lunar mansion Puṣyā and the planet Jupiter coincide, a member of the kṣatriya, vaiśya, or brahmin castes, who is fair skinned with blond facial hair, should kill a man with a weapon of punnāga wood or aśvattha wood.

original: ka 'am / aa shvattha la 'gegs nas shi ba'i ro blangs la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste /
analyzed: ka 'am / aa shvattha la 'gegs nas shi ba'i ro blangs la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste /
translated: Take the corpse to the center of the maṇḍala.

original: dur khrod brgyad kyi mkha' 'gro gang yang rung ba la dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byas la 'jig rten gyi dngos grub grub pa dang / zhing skyod brgyad la gang yang rung ba bcug nas bsam gtan dang gzugs med thun mong gi dngos grub sgrub pa dang /
analyzed: dur khrod brgyad kyi mkha' 'gro gang yang rung ba la dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byas la 'jig rten gyi dngos grub grub pa dang / zhing skyod brgyad la gang yang rung ba bcug nas bsam gtan dang gzugs med thun mong gi dngos grub sgrub pa dang /
translated: Having caused any of the eight field-born [dakinis] to enter, one should accomplish the common powers of meditative concentration and the formless [absorptions].

original: rigs lnga'i ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma bcug nas mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs lnga'i ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma bcug nas mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having caused the ten awareness dakinis of the five families to enter, one will accomplish the supreme powers.

original: de la dang po dur khrod du dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa 'jig rten gyi dngos grub kyi dbang du mdzad nas 'dzem pa med par ro'i khar sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de la dang po dur khrod du dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa 'jig rten gyi dngos grub kyi dbang du mdzad nas 'dzem pa med par ro'i khar sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya zhes gsungs te /
translated: Regarding that, first, in the charnel ground, in order to accomplish the mandala for the sake of mundane powers, it is said that one should perform the burnt offering one hundred and eight times on the corpse without hesitation.

original: dang por bsnyen pa'i dus su du ba dang 'bar ba dang 'phar ba mthong nas ro'i lte ba'i dbus su me'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas rkang pa rlung gis g-yabs te lte ba nas 'bar bas mig me'i sgo nas dro ba'i rtags 'byung ba dang / rna ba rlung gi sgo nas 'phar ba dang /
analyzed: dang por bsnyen pa'i dus su du ba dang 'bar ba dang 'phar ba mthong nas ro'i lte ba'i dbus su me'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas rkang pa rlung gis g-yabs te lte ba nas 'bar bas mig me'i sgo nas dro ba'i rtags 'byung ba dang / rna ba rlung gi sgo nas 'phar ba dang /
translated: The sign of leaping will arise from the ear, the door of wind.🔽The sign of smoke will arise from the nose, the door of earth.

original: sna sa'i sgo nas du ba dang / kha chu'i sgo nas smra ba dang / 'phar ba'i rtags 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sna sa'i sgo nas du ba dang / kha chu'i sgo nas smra ba dang / 'phar ba'i rtags 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The sign of speech will arise from the mouth, the door of water.

original: de'i tshe me lha thugs kar bzhag la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe me lha thugs kar bzhag la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
translated: At that time, having placed the fire god in one’s heart, one should perform one hundred and eight fire sacrifices.

original: de nas dur khrod kyi mkha' 'gro bkug la 'dzem pa dang bag tsha ba med pas ro'i khar sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dur khrod kyi mkha' 'gro bkug la 'dzem pa dang bag tsha ba med pas ro'i khar sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
translated: Then, having summoned the ḍākinīs of the charnel grounds, without hesitation or fear, one should perform one hundred and eight fire sacrifices in the mouth of the corpse.

original: de nas ro de langs la ci zhes smra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas ro de langs la ci zhes smra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, that corpse will arise and speak.

original: de la lha ma yin gyi bu mo 'dod nas @422b 'og tu 'gro ba la sogs pa dang / dngos grub gang yang rung ba cig byin cig brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de la lha ma yin gyi bu mo 'dod nas @422b 'og tu 'gro ba la sogs pa dang / dngos grub gang yang rung ba cig byin cig brjod par bya'o //
translated: If one desires the daughter of an asura, one should say, “Give me any power whatsoever.”

original: de nas 'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro des gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bu ga nas zhugs te /
analyzed: de nas 'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro des gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bu ga nas zhugs te /
translated: Then, the worldly ḍākinī enters through the thirty-two bodily orifices.

original: rdo rje snying gis ma zin par lha ma yin gyi bu mo'i gnas su 'gro ba'am /
analyzed: rdo rje snying gis ma zin par lha ma yin gyi bu mo'i gnas su 'gro ba'am /
translated: If one is not held by the vajra heart, one will go to the abode of the daughter of an asura.

original: g-yul las rgyal ba'i dngos grub bam /
analyzed: g-yul las rgyal ba'i dngos grub bam /
translated: Or, one will obtain the power of victory in battle,

original: mngon spyod kyi cho gas tshar bcad pa 'am /
analyzed: mngon spyod kyi cho gas tshar bcad pa 'am /
translated: or one will be destroyed by the rite of destroying,

original: zhi ba dang rgyas pas phan 'dogs pa'am /
analyzed: zhi ba dang rgyas pas phan 'dogs pa'am /
translated: or one will be benefited by pacifying and increasing,

original: mig sman gyis bcud len gyi sman rnyed pa'am /
analyzed: mig sman gyis bcud len gyi sman rnyed pa'am /
translated: or one will obtain the elixir of life by means of eye medicine,

original: sa 'og gi gter ram /
analyzed: sa 'og gi gter ram /
translated: or one will obtain the treasure of the underworld,

original: dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi rkang mgyogs sam /
analyzed: dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi rkang mgyogs sam /
translated: or one will obtain the swift feet that can travel a thousand leagues in an instant.

original: lo stong la sogs pa thub pa'i bcud kyis len gang yang rung ba cig byin nas rang gi gnas su 'gro ba yin gyi gzhan du ma yin zhes bya ba ni nyi ma dang zla ba ni sa la lhung yang srid /
analyzed: lo stong la sogs pa thub pa'i bcud kyis len gang yang rung ba cig byin nas rang gi gnas su 'gro ba yin gyi gzhan du ma yin zhes bya ba ni nyi ma dang zla ba ni sa la lhung yang srid /
translated: The sun and moon may fall to the ground,

original: rlung ni rgyun las bzlog kyang srid /
analyzed: rlung ni rgyun las bzlog kyang srid /
translated: the wind may be reversed from its course,

original: ro langs kyi dngos grub ni gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: ro langs kyi dngos grub ni gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: but the power of the vetāla is not elsewhere.

original: steng dang sa 'og pho nya grub //
analyzed: steng dang sa 'og pho nya grub //
translated: The messenger is accomplished above and below.

original: ces bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
translated: This means that there will be the powers of body, speech, and mind.

original: rgyud 'dir the tshom med kyang rung //
analyzed: rgyud 'dir the tshom med kyang rung //
translated: Even if one has doubts about this Tantra,

original: zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar 'grub po zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar 'grub po zhes pa'i don to //
translated: this means that one will certainly accomplish it.

original: de ltar ro langs kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar ro langs kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the accomplishment of the vetāla maṇḍala in this way,

original: ro langs sgrub pa'i tshe rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid lhar ji ltar bskyed par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ro langs sgrub pa'i tshe rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid lhar ji ltar bskyed par bya zhe na /
translated: when accomplishing the vetāla, how should the practitioner generate himself as the deity?

original: gnas pa'i rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro bas dang por rten gyi dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni gdul ba drag po 'jigs byed kyi brda'i dbang du byas nas yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni lci ba'o //
analyzed: gnas pa'i rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro bas dang por rten gyi dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni gdul ba drag po 'jigs byed kyi brda'i dbang du byas nas yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni lci ba'o //
translated: From yam arises the wind mandala, which is heavy.

original: ram las me'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni thal ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ram las me'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni thal ba zhes bya'o //
translated: From ram arises the fire mandala, which is called “ash.”

original: bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor la lhag ma zhes bya ste /
analyzed: bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor la lhag ma zhes bya ste /
translated: From vam arises the water mandala, which is called “the remainder.”

original: mngon brjod las kyang /
analyzed: mngon brjod las kyang /
translated: The Mimaṃsā also says:

original: lhag ma rngams su 'bum phrag brgyad //🔽ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhag ma rngams su 'bum phrag brgyad // ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The remainder is 800,000 yojanas.

original: lam las sa'i dkyil 'khor la ni mgo bo skom po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lam las sa'i dkyil 'khor la ni mgo bo skom po zhes bya'o //
translated: From lam arises the earth mandala, which is called “the head.”

original: dung chen po'i ngo bo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dung chen po'i ngo bo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The “great conch” is

original: ri rab dang ri bdun dang / rol mtsho dang gling bzhi lcags ris bskor ba'o //🔽de yang kha sbyor las mgo bo ri rgyal lhun po yin //
analyzed: ri rab dang ri bdun dang / rol mtsho dang gling bzhi lcags ris bskor ba'o // de yang kha sbyor las mgo bo ri rgyal lhun po yin //
translated: Meru, the seven mountains, the outer ocean, and the four continents surrounded by an iron ring.🔽The Samputa Tantra says:

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: de la bye brag tu /

analyzed: 'chi bdag 'joms pa bshad pas na //

analyzed: gang yang sgrub par byed pa'i sngags // zhes bya ba gsungs te /

translated: The garland is the mutual union of the father and mother, entering from the navel of the father into the navel of the mother, and entering and circulating in the reverse order, from the navel of the mother into the navel of the father.

original: zhi ba la ni lhod pa ste //
analyzed: zhi ba la ni lhod pa ste //
translated: In the case of pacification, it is slow.

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi bzlas pa so dang mchu sbyar nas lce cung zad tsam bsgul ba'o //

original: rlung gi rgyu ba ni sa dang chu dal bar rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: rlung gi rgyu ba ni sa dang chu dal bar rgyu ba'o //

original: drag cing rtsub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: drag cing rtsub pa ma yin no //

translated: This is not the case for pacifying and enriching, which are not like the recitation of speech in the case of power and assault, which is like the blowing of wind from the mouth and nose, like the howling of a demon, and like the recitation in a fierce and harsh manner on the maṇḍala of fire and wind.

original: rang rang gi ni phyogs gnas nas //
analyzed: rang rang gi ni phyogs gnas nas //

analyzed: cho ga'i dbye ba bstan pa'o //
translated: the divisions of the rites are taught.

original: zhes bya ba ni g-yas nas sa'i rlung rgyu ba dang / g-yon nas rlung gi rlung rgyu ba dang / gnyis ka nas sa'i rlung rgyu ba dang / dal bar rgyu ba chu'i rlung ni dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rang rang gi phyogs kyi dbye ba bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni g-yas nas sa'i rlung rgyu ba dang / g-yon nas rlung gi rlung rgyu ba dang / gnyis ka nas sa'i rlung rgyu ba dang / dal bar rgyu ba chu'i rlung ni dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rang rang gi phyogs kyi dbye ba bstan to //
translated: This is the teaching of the divisions of the directions of the four maṇḍalas: the movement of the earth wind on the right, the movement of the wind wind on the left, the movement of the earth wind on both, and the movement of the water wind slowly.

original: sa bon phreng ba de nas zin //
analyzed: sa bon phreng ba de nas zin //
translated: Then, having taken up the garland of seed syllables,

original: zhes bya ba ni sa bon phreng ba snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa bon phreng ba snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
translated: the garland of seed syllables is the essence and the near essence.

original: de nas zin zhes bya ba ni thog mar yi ge aom nas bzung ba'o //
analyzed: de nas zin zhes bya ba ni thog mar yi ge aom nas bzung ba'o //
translated: Then seized means beginning with the syllable Om.

original: h'um ni mtha' ru gnas pa yin //
analyzed: h'um ni mtha' ru gnas pa yin //
translated: Hum is at the end.

original: zhes bya ba ni mthar h'um phat sv'a h'a dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mthar h'um phat sv'a h'a dang bcas pa'o //
translated: That is, at the end, with Hum, Phat, Svaha.

original: de ltar bsgom pa dang bzlas pa byas nas bskyed pa'i rim pa'i las la sbyor ba'i tshe ji ltar sbyar bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar bsgom pa dang bzlas pa byas nas bskyed pa'i rim pa'i las la sbyor ba'i tshe ji ltar sbyar bar bya zhe na /
translated: Having thus meditated and recited, when one is applying oneself to the rite of the creation stage, how should one apply oneself?

original: sgrub pa 'gag par gyur na ni //
analyzed: sgrub pa 'gag par gyur na ni //
translated: If one is to accomplish the cessation,

original: gom pa gcig kyang mi 'gro'o //🔽zhes bya ba ni 'chi bdag gi gzugs byas la dur khrod kyi ras la rkang pa brgyad pa'i 'khrul 'khor dug dang khrag gis bris la dbus kyi 'chi bdag gi bdud kyi ming m'a ra ya dang bcas pa bris te 'khrul 'khor linggar bcug nas sngags kyi 'od
analyzed: gom pa gcig kyang mi 'gro'o // zhes bya ba ni 'chi bdag gi gzugs byas la dur khrod kyi ras la rkang pa brgyad pa'i 'khrul 'khor dug dang khrag gis bris la dbus kyi 'chi bdag gi bdud kyi ming m'a ra ya dang bcas pa bris te 'khrul 'khor linggar bcug nas sngags kyi 'od
translated: one should not take even one step.

original: zer brgyad kyis bcug na gom pa gcig kyang 'gro bar mi nus par 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zer brgyad kyis bcug na gom pa gcig kyang 'gro bar mi nus par 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having made the form of the Lord of Death, one should write the eight-line wheel on a cloth from a charnel ground with poison and blood, and write the name of the Mara of the Lord of Death in the center with Mara-ya. Having inserted the wheel into the linga, if one inserts it with the eight light rays of the mantra, one will be unable to take even one step and will die.

original: 'od zer brgyad gang zhe na kha sbyor bar gyur pa dang zhes bya ba rdo rje phra mo'i 'od zer dkar dmar thogs pa 'phros pas gom pa gcig kyang @426b mi 'gro ba ni dang po'o //
analyzed: 'od zer brgyad gang zhe na kha sbyor bar gyur pa dang zhes bya ba rdo rje phra mo'i 'od zer dkar dmar thogs pa 'phros pas gom pa gcig kyang @426b mi 'gro ba ni dang po'o //
translated: What are the eight light rays? The first is that the light rays of the white and red subtle vajras, which have become conjoined, spread out without even taking a single step.

original: 'od zer gyi lha mo rnams phyir log nas dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rgyal ba'i thabs phyag g-yon pas kha tv'am ga bzung nas phyag g-yas pas bdud rtsi lnga'i thod pa bsnams pas rang gi zhal du mchod yon gyi bdud rtsi'i nges par sbyar bas dus
analyzed: 'od zer gyi lha mo rnams phyir log nas dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rgyal ba'i thabs phyag g-yon pas kha tv'am ga bzung nas phyag g-yas pas bdud rtsi lnga'i thod pa bsnams pas rang gi zhal du mchod yon gyi bdud rtsi'i nges par sbyar bas dus
translated: The second is that the light ray goddesses return and, having conquered untimely death, hold a khaṭvāṅga in the left hand and a skull cup of the five elixirs in the right hand, and they offer the elixir of the drinking water to their own mouths.

original: ma yin par 'chi ba bzlog nas tshe 'phel bar byed do //
analyzed: ma yin par 'chi ba bzlog nas tshe 'phel bar byed do //
translated: Having conquered untimely death, they increase life.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings pa'i lha mo brgyad 'phros nas 'chi bdag bcings pas dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rgyal nas kha tv'am ga bsnams shing bdud rtsi'i mchod pa zhal du sbyor ba ni gnyis pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings pa'i lha mo brgyad 'phros nas 'chi bdag bcings pas dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rgyal nas kha tv'am ga bsnams shing bdud rtsi'i mchod pa zhal du sbyor ba ni gnyis pa yin no //
translated: Similarly, the eight goddesses who bind the vajra chain spread out and, having bound the Lord of Death, they hold a khaṭvāṅga and offer the elixir to their mouths.

original: rdo rjes phye ba nyid dang ni //
analyzed: rdo rjes phye ba nyid dang ni //
translated: And the one opened by the vajra.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thogs pa'i lha mo spros nas 'chi bdag bcom ste slar log pas dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba las rgyal nas kha tv'am ga bsnams pas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa mchod yon zhal du 'dren pa ni gsum pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thogs pa'i lha mo spros nas 'chi bdag bcom ste slar log pas dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba las rgyal nas kha tv'am ga bsnams pas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa mchod yon zhal du 'dren pa ni gsum pa'o //
translated: The third is the victory over untimely death by the emanation of the goddess holding a vajra, who conquers the Lord of Death and returns. Having won, she takes the nectar offering into her mouth, smelling the katvanga.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje kha dog lnga pa'i sgro'i chun po spros nas bsgrub bya 'gog pa ni bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje kha dog lnga pa'i sgro'i chun po spros nas bsgrub bya 'gog pa ni bzhi pa'o //
translated: The fourth is the binding of the victim by the emanation of the vajra noose of five colors.

original: lcags kyu bsnams pa'i lha mos dgug pa ni lnga pa'o //
analyzed: lcags kyu bsnams pa'i lha mos dgug pa ni lnga pa'o //
translated: The fifth is the summoning by the goddess holding a hook.

original: gtun shing bsnams nas dgug pa ni drug pa'o //
analyzed: gtun shing bsnams nas dgug pa ni drug pa'o //
translated: The sixth is the summoning by the goddess holding a club.

original: rdo rje kha yis za ba ni bdun pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje kha yis za ba ni bdun pa'o //
translated: The seventh is the eating by the goddess holding a vajra mouth.

original: mda' yis bcings pa spro ba ni brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: mda' yis bcings pa spro ba ni brgyad pa'o //
translated: The eighth is the emanation of the binding by the arrow.

original: de ltar phyag mtshan brgyad dang bcas pa'i lha mo spros nas dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bdag las rgyal ba ni phrin las mdzad nas slar bsdus pa'i tshe phyag g-yon pas kha tv'am ga bsnams shing /
analyzed: de ltar phyag mtshan brgyad dang bcas pa'i lha mo spros nas dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bdag las rgyal ba ni phrin las mdzad nas slar bsdus pa'i tshe phyag g-yon pas kha tv'am ga bsnams shing /
translated: When she performs her activity and reabsorbs them, she holds the khaṭvāṅga in her left hand and the skull-cup filled with the five elixirs in her right hand.🔽She drinks the elixir with her mouth, imagining a white five-pronged vajra.

original: phyag g-yas pas thod pa bdud rtsi lnga'i mchod yon rang gi zhal du rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bsams la bdud rtsi lnga'i mchod yon 'thungs pa ni nges par sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yas pas thod pa bdud rtsi lnga'i mchod yon rang gi zhal du rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bsams la bdud rtsi lnga'i mchod yon 'thungs pa ni nges par sbyar ba'o //
translated: This is the definitive application.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa las lha mo brgyad spros pa ni 'chi bdag gi bdud 'gog cing gom pa gcig kyang mi 'gro bas dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rgyal ba'i phrin las mdzad nas slar sdud pa'i tshe
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa las lha mo brgyad spros pa ni 'chi bdag gi bdud 'gog cing gom pa gcig kyang mi 'gro bas dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rgyal ba'i phrin las mdzad nas slar sdud pa'i tshe
translated: This is what is being taught: The eight goddesses emanate from the union of method and wisdom, stopping the demon of death and performing the activity of conquering untimely death without taking even a single step.

original: lha mo brgyad kyi phyag g-yon pas kha tva'm ga bsnams shing g-yas pas bdud rtsi'i thod pa bsnams nas tshe 'phel ba'i phyir rang la 'dren par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: lha mo brgyad kyi phyag g-yon pas kha tva'm ga bsnams shing g-yas pas bdud rtsi'i thod pa bsnams nas tshe 'phel ba'i phyir rang la 'dren par byed pa yin no //
translated: The eight goddesses hold khaṭvāṅgas in their left hands and skull cups of nectar in their right hands, and they draw up the nectar for the sake of increasing life.

original: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dbang du byas pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dbang du byas pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the creation stage,

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro las kha sbyor ni nyi ma dang zla ba ste wa santi las 'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro las kha sbyor ni nyi ma dang zla ba ste wa santi las 'o //
translated: the union of sun and moon is the vajra dakini from the Vajradaka.

original: rdo rje lu gu rgyud ni las kyi phyag rgya dang 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje lu gu rgyud ni las kyi phyag rgya dang 'khyud pa'o //
translated: The vajra chain is the embrace of the karma consort.

original: @427a * // rdo rje dbye ba ni aa wa dh'u t'i dang 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: @427a * // rdo rje dbye ba ni aa wa dh'u t'i dang 'khyud pa'o //
translated: The vajra division is the embrace of the avadhūti.

original: sgro'i chun pos bskor ba ni h'um phat kyis bskor ba'o //
analyzed: sgro'i chun pos bskor ba ni h'um phat kyis bskor ba'o //
translated: The enclosure of the fence is the enclosure of hūṃ phaṭ.

original: lcags kyus 'gugs pa ni bdud rtsi thig le gyen du bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: lcags kyus 'gugs pa ni bdud rtsi thig le gyen du bzlog pa'o //
translated: The hook summons is the reversal of the drop of nectar.

original: gtun shing gis dkrugs pa ni sa chu me rlung bzhi'i rtsa bzhag nas a'a na ha'i rtsas grub pa'o ;
analyzed: gtun shing gis dkrugs pa ni sa chu me rlung bzhi'i rtsa bzhag nas a'a na ha'i rtsas grub pa'o ;
translated: The churning of the pestle is the establishment of the four nāḍīs of earth, water, fire, and air, and the establishment of the nāḍī of ānā and apāna.

original: / rdo rje kha'i bza' ba ni bde ba stong nyid kyis rgyas btab nas shing las skyes pa'i srin bu bzhin du za ba'o //
analyzed: / rdo rje kha'i bza' ba ni bde ba stong nyid kyis rgyas btab nas shing las skyes pa'i srin bu bzhin du za ba'o //
translated: The vajra-mouth food is eating with the seal of bliss-emptiness, like a worm born from a tree.

original: dbugs pa mda' dang sbyar ba ni reg bya'i stong pa nyid kyi steng du stong pa nyid la nges pa'i shes pa 'dren pa'o //
analyzed: dbugs pa mda' dang sbyar ba ni reg bya'i stong pa nyid kyi steng du stong pa nyid la nges pa'i shes pa 'dren pa'o //
translated: The breath-arrow union is the bringing of the certainty-knowledge of emptiness on top of the emptiness of tactile objects.

original: dus min 'chi las rgyal ba ni g-yas par sa n'a nas gyen du bzlog pa ni wa sha ta ta tva zhes byas te bcud kyis len du 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dus min 'chi las rgyal ba ni g-yas par sa n'a nas gyen du bzlog pa ni wa sha ta ta tva zhes byas te bcud kyis len du 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The victory over untimely death is the reversal of the right-side sāna, saying “vāśa tvaṃ” and becoming an elixir.

original: kha tv'am ga ni lha'i sku bde ba stong par rtogs pa'i lus so //
analyzed: kha tv'am ga ni lha'i sku bde ba stong par rtogs pa'i lus so //
translated: The khaṭvāṅga is the body that realizes the bliss-emptiness of the divine body.

original: thod pa'i mchod yon ni btsun mo'i yum gyi bha ga'i byang chub sems so //
analyzed: thod pa'i mchod yon ni btsun mo'i yum gyi bha ga'i byang chub sems so //
translated: The skull-cup libation is the bodhicitta of the bhaga of the queen’s womb.🔽The libation to the mouth is the entry of the bodhicitta into the mouth of the avadhūti.

original: zhal du mchod yon aa wa dh'u ti'i zhal du byang chub kyi sems 'jug pa yin zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhal du mchod yon aa wa dh'u ti'i zhal du byang chub kyi sems 'jug pa yin zhes gsungs so //
translated: This is what is said.

original: le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: The explanation of the thirty-fifth chapter is finished.

original: // / de ltar 'chi bdag 'joms pa bshad nas da ni chags pa'i lam gyis gsang ba'i sbyin sreg bshad pa ni /
analyzed: // / de ltar 'chi bdag 'joms pa bshad nas da ni chags pa'i lam gyis gsang ba'i sbyin sreg bshad pa ni /
translated: Having explained the destruction of the Lord of Death in this way, now, the secret burnt offering by the path of passion is explained.🔽Then, the great worship of the consort,

original: de nas / phyag rgya'i mchod pa chen po dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nas / phyag rgya'i mchod pa chen po dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: and so on.

original: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyangs nas btsun mo yum gyi bha ga'i thab khung du gsang ba'i rdo rje'i dgang gzar gyis byang chub sems kyi da gang blugs byed pa ni phyag rgya'i mchod chen zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyangs nas btsun mo yum gyi bha ga'i thab khung du gsang ba'i rdo rje'i dgang gzar gyis byang chub sems kyi da gang blugs byed pa ni phyag rgya'i mchod chen zhes bya'o //
translated: Having trained with the heroes and yoginis in the four means of attraction, the secret vajra ladle fills the hearth of the bhaga of the queen, the mother, with the oblation of bodhicitta. This is called the “great worship of the consort.”

original: byang chub sems dga' bral du song na bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin nyams nas sngags dgod pa bzlog pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dga' bral du song na bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin nyams nas sngags dgod pa bzlog pa ste /
translated: If the bodhicitta is lost, the bliss samādhi degenerates, and the recitation of the mantra is reversed.

original: nang gi sbyin sreg gi phyag rgya'i mchod pa 'di dag ni las bcu gnyis myur du grub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: nang gi sbyin sreg gi phyag rgya'i mchod pa 'di dag ni las bcu gnyis myur du grub par byed pa yin no //
translated: These inner burnt offerings of the worship of the consort quickly accomplish the twelve deeds.

original: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
translated: Having explained that in brief, the extensive explanation is as follows.

original: mtshan nyid gnyis las sngags sbyar ba //
analyzed: mtshan nyid gnyis las sngags sbyar ba //
translated: The mantra is applied to the two realities.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: gsang ba'i rdo rje dang bha ga'i dbus su yi ge dhi dang bya zhes bya ba gnyis kyi sngags kyis byang chub sems bzlog par bya'o zhes kun spyod las gsungs so //
analyzed: gsang ba'i rdo rje dang bha ga'i dbus su yi ge dhi dang bya zhes bya ba gnyis kyi sngags kyis byang chub sems bzlog par bya'o zhes kun spyod las gsungs so //
translated: In the center of the secret vajra and bhaga, the mantra of the two syllables dhi and bya should block the bodhicitta, it is said in the Samcarya.

original: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro gnyis med pa //
analyzed: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro gnyis med pa //
translated: The hero and dakini are nondual,

original: blo ldan rnal 'byor ma bsgrub bya //
analyzed: blo ldan rnal 'byor ma bsgrub bya //
translated: the wise one should practice the yoginis.

original: zhes bya ba ni bha ga'i @427b dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bha ga'i @427b dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'o //
translated: Thus, in the bhaga mandala, one should meditate on the bodhicitta mandala.

original: rnal 'byor dri med lus ni zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i shes pa rtog pa med pa skyes pa'i lus ni dri med lus so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dri med lus ni zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i shes pa rtog pa med pa skyes pa'i lus ni dri med lus so //
translated: The body of stainless yoga is the body of the arising of nonconceptual consciousness free from the eighty natural [ideas].

original: padma'i phyag rgya gnon pa'i lus rnams ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dga' ba dang / rnam par smin pa'i mchog dga' dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i dus su //
analyzed: padma'i phyag rgya gnon pa'i lus rnams ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dga' ba dang / rnam par smin pa'i mchog dga' dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i dus su //
translated: The bodies that press the lotus consort are the various kinds of joy, the supreme joy of full ripening, and the time of freedom from characteristics.

original: de bzhin mtshon cha nyid dang sbyar / zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de bzhin mtshon cha nyid dang sbyar / zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Thus, it is said, “Likewise, one should apply the weapon itself.”

original: dga' ba'i dus kyi tshe yi ge 'khrul 'khor gyi mtshon cha dang sbyar ba dang / de bzhin du mchog dga'i tshe rlung gi 'khrul 'khor gyi mtshon cha dang sbyar ba de bzhin du lhan cig skyes dga'i dus su gzung 'dzin 'gog pa'i aa sa ma sa ma zhes bya ba nges pa'i shes pa drangs pas rnam par rtog pa las bzlog pa'i mtshon
analyzed: dga' ba'i dus kyi tshe yi ge 'khrul 'khor gyi mtshon cha dang sbyar ba dang / de bzhin du mchog dga'i tshe rlung gi 'khrul 'khor gyi mtshon cha dang sbyar ba de bzhin du lhan cig skyes dga'i dus su gzung 'dzin 'gog pa'i aa sa ma sa ma zhes bya ba nges pa'i shes pa drangs pas rnam par rtog pa las bzlog pa'i mtshon
translated: At the time of joy, the wheel of syllables is applied to the weapon of the wheel; likewise, at the time of supreme joy, the wheel of the vāyu is applied to the weapon of the wheel; likewise, at the time of connate joy, the weapon that stops the apprehender and the apprehended is the definitive consciousness called “asama sāsama,” which is the weapon that turns away from conceptuality.

original: cha dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: cha dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: At the time of joy, one should apply the weapon of the wheel of syllables, and likewise at the time of supreme joy, one should apply the weapon of the wheel of wind. Likewise, at the time of innate joy, one should apply the weapon of the reversal of discursive thought, by which the ascertainment “a sa ma sa ma” is induced, which stops the subject-object dichotomy.

original: ci'i phyir mtshon cha yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mtshon cha yin zhe na /
translated: Why are they weapons?

original: kha sbyor las dang po'i shes pa rnams yul gyi bde ba la dga' bral mi 'gro ba'i phyir na mtshon cha zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: kha sbyor las dang po'i shes pa rnams yul gyi bde ba la dga' bral mi 'gro ba'i phyir na mtshon cha zhes gsungs so //
translated: Because the first consciousnesses in union do not go to the bliss of the object, they are called weapons.

original: sngags pas mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor ba'i snying po rnams kyis de bzhin bya ba ni dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i snying pos kyang byang chub sems bzlog pa de bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: sngags pas mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor ba'i snying po rnams kyis de bzhin bya ba ni dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i snying pos kyang byang chub sems bzlog pa de bzhin du bya'o //
translated: The yogin should do likewise with the essences of the ḍākinīs’ union, and the hero and heroine essences should also do likewise in reversing the bodhicitta.

original: dpa' bo mchod pa'i cho ga shes /
analyzed: dpa' bo mchod pa'i cho ga shes /
translated: The hero knows the rite of worship.

original: las kyi 'bad pa nyid kyis bya //
analyzed: las kyi 'bad pa nyid kyis bya //
translated: By the effort of the rite itself.

original: zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid mchod pa'i rjes la dgug pa la sogs pa'i las bcu gnyis bya bar gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid mchod pa'i rjes la dgug pa la sogs pa'i las bcu gnyis bya bar gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is saying that after the worship of reality, the twelve rites such as summoning should be performed.

original: mkhas pa chen po dzny'a na shr'i'i zhal snga nas rlung gi 'khrul 'khor gyis byang chub sems bzlog pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: mkhas pa chen po dzny'a na shr'i'i zhal snga nas rlung gi 'khrul 'khor gyis byang chub sems bzlog pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
translated: The great scholar Jñānaśrī says that the wind wheel reverses the bodhicitta.

original: rnal 'byor rang dga'i sngags las ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rang dga'i sngags las ni //
translated: From the mantra of the yogin's own desire.

original: zhes bya ba ni phrin las bzhi'i rnam par dbye bas rnal 'byor pa rang dga' ba'i sngags kyis dbang dang mngon spyod la yab kyi zhal dang sbyar bas tshar gcod pa dang / zhi ba dang rgyas pa la yum gyi zhal nas yab kyi zhal du bzlog nas sbyar bas ni phan 'dogs par byed do //

analyzed: sbyor ba yi ni don rnams la //
